['', 'Duration: 03+ Months', 'Duties/Responsibilities for the ExtraCare Analyst job include but are not limited to:', ' 5+ years in an analytical role Highly proficient in using SQL for extraction and manipulation of data, very strong SQL skills is a must to have for this role Working knowledge of SAS/R/Python and Excel-VBA Analytical mindset with detail orientation Ability to multi-task several on concurrent requests and quickly pull together data and generate impactful insights Working knowledge of statistics, sampling techniques and analysis of variation (ANOVA). Good to have strong understanding of control group creation, linear regression/ factor analysis/ logistic regression/ generalized linear models/ tree models (CART, MART), data visualization etc. Practical application of these techniques in a retail marketing setting will be nice to have', 'Working knowledge of SAS/R/Python and Excel-VBA', 'Education:', ' Create analysis on customer data, campaign/program data and investment data to understand customer behavior in relation to the portfolio, campaigns and offers. Write codes to run complex analysis on customer and program/campaign data and generate analytics to understand the effectiveness of ExtraCare marketing programs inclusive of test and learn studies. Deliver insights around ExtraCare customers and marketing programs to enhance future programs. Present findings to Marketing and various other functional groups throughout retail. Conduct Adhoc Analytics and dashboards to support various functional groups throughout retail and all other duties as assigned.', 'Conduct Adhoc Analytics and dashboards to support various functional groups throughout retail and all other duties as assigned.', 'Write codes to run complex analysis on customer and program/campaign data and generate analytics to understand the effectiveness of ExtraCare marketing programs inclusive of test and learn studies.', 'Position: Data Analyst / Marketing Data Analyst', 'Experience/Basic skills required for the ExtraCare Analyst job:', 'Advanced degree in Statistics, quantitative economics, computer science or a related field will be good to have.', 'Working knowledge of statistics, sampling techniques and analysis of variation (ANOVA).', "Bachelor's degree in statistics, mathematics, computer science, quantitative economics or related field", 'Highly proficient in using SQL for extraction and manipulation of data, very strong SQL skills is a must to have for this role', '5+ years in an analytical role', 'Good to have strong understanding of control group creation, linear regression/ factor analysis/ logistic regression/ generalized linear models/ tree models (CART, MART), data visualization etc. Practical application of these techniques in a retail marketing setting will be nice to have', 'Deliver insights around ExtraCare customers and marketing programs to enhance future programs.', 'Analytical mindset with detail orientation', 'Position Summary:', 'The ExtraCare Analyst job will deliver insights and analytics around ExtraCare customers by analyzing customer behavior relative to campaigns, offers, channels to quantify their financial impact on the Client retail business. ['', ' Provides scientific expertise for clinical drug development from trial design to final study report for assigned projects and may represent the department on core teams.  Key contributor to the clinical development plans including design of clinical programs, concept sheets and proposals to support clinical development  Keeps current on scientific and medical literature in target therapeutic areas. Appropriately designs studies to meet desired clinical endpoints and works with clinical development team to determine appropriate methods, procedures and measurements. Works closely with Biostatisticians in designing studies and analysis of data, and with Medical lead to ensure medical input/oversight of study design and medical review of data during clinical trials and analysis. Ensures studies are designed appropriately for study conduct with Clinical Operations and collaborates with Data Management for appropriate data collection. Contributor to the clinical sections of regulatory documents including IND and BLA/NDS, investigator’s brochure, developmental safety update reports, clinical overview/summaries and product labeling/prescribing information; works with Medical Writing to execute on these deliverables, when necessary. Meets measurable short- and long-term objectives for assigned clinical studies and appropriately escalates issues and changes in program goals and timelines. Routinely makes project decisions with team input to resolve problems and assesses impact to clinical development program(s). Develops collaborative relationships with other internal groups including Research & Development, Regulatory Affairs and corporate Project Management groups to ensure common goals are met.  Develops professional scientific and clinical development communications including presenting relevant clinical information internally to department(s), project teams and leadership teams.  Delivers internal clinical trial/program training and study/program updates, may represent Emergent externally at investigators meetings/study initiation visits, and at scientific conferences/meetings.  May present clinical plans, clinical study protocols and study results at regulatory meetings, for example FDA, Health Canada, EMA. Interacts with scientific and medical experts and opinion leaders and study investigators regarding the development of clinical study protocols and programs.  May represent the department on core teams and present scientific data internally and externally. Participates in development and continuous improvement of departmental processes and workflows. ', 'Qualified candidates will have an advanced degree in Life Sciences (Ph.D. preferred) or Medicine. ', 'Appropriately designs studies to meet desired clinical endpoints and works with clinical development team to determine appropriate methods, procedures and measurements.', 'Participates in development and continuous improvement of departmental processes and workflows.', 'Excellent knowledge of Health Canada, FDA, other international regulations and ICH-GCP guidelines required.', 'Works closely with Biostatisticians in designing studies and analysis of data, and with Medical lead to ensure medical input/oversight of study design and medical review of data during clinical trials and analysis. Ensures studies are designed appropriately for study conduct with Clinical Operations and collaborates with Data Management for appropriate data collection.', 'May represent the department on core teams and present scientific data internally and externally.', ' Successful Completion of a Criminal Record Check.', 'Excellent written and oral communication skills are required.', 'May present clinical plans, clinical study protocols and study results at regulatory meetings, for example FDA, Health Canada, EMA.', ' Citizenship/Permanent Resident or Valid Work Permit.', 'Develops professional scientific and clinical development communications including presenting relevant clinical information internally to department(s), project teams and leadership teams. ', 'Delivers internal clinical trial/program training and study/program updates, may represent Emergent externally at investigators meetings/study initiation visits, and at scientific conferences/meetings. ', 'Meets measurable short- and long-term objectives for assigned clinical studies and appropriately escalates issues and changes in program goals and timelines.', 'Routinely makes project decisions with team input to resolve problems and assesses impact to clinical development program(s).', 'EXPERIENCE', 'Interacts with scientific and medical experts and opinion leaders and study investigators regarding the development of clinical study protocols and programs. ', 'Keeps current on scientific and medical literature in target therapeutic areas.', 'Education, Experience & Skills', 'Key contributor to the clinical development plans including design of clinical programs, concept sheets and proposals to support clinical development ', 'At least 2-5 years of experience as a Clinical Research Scientist or of related experience.', 'Develops collaborative relationships with other internal groups including Research & Development, Regulatory Affairs and corporate Project Management groups to ensure common goals are met. ', 'Ability to communicate and present complex scientific and clinical issues to management and regulatory authorities.', 'Contributor to the clinical sections of regulatory documents including IND and BLA/NDS, investigator’s brochure, developmental safety update reports, clinical overview/summaries and product labeling/prescribing information; works with Medical Writing to execute on these deliverables, when necessary.', 'Excellent computer skills, with ability to work within core templates designed for regulatory submissions, basic MS software, search engines for literature reviews, navigating regulatory websites.', 'Additional Requirements', 'KNOWLEDGE, SKILLS & ABILITIES:', 'Provides scientific expertise for clinical drug development from trial design to final study report for assigned projects and may represent the department on core teams. ', ' Qualified candidates will have an advanced degree in Life Sciences (Ph.D. preferred) or Medicine.  EXPERIENCE At least 2-5 years of experience as a Clinical Research Scientist or of related experience. KNOWLEDGE, SKILLS & ABILITIES: Excellent written and oral communication skills are required. Excellent knowledge of Health Canada, FDA, other international regulations and ICH-GCP guidelines required. Ability to communicate and present complex scientific and clinical issues to management and regulatory authorities. Excellent computer skills, with ability to work within core templates designed for regulatory submissions, basic MS software, search engines for literature reviews, navigating regulatory websites. ', 'Responsibilities']

['', 'Job Description:', 'Team gathers and produces data around security findings and goal of this role (expert of collecting data) from different sources and then visualizing it and cleaning it up so it appears in PowerBI. Position consists of data gathering, processing and analytics. Some folks will be good data engineers, some analyst, some data scientist. This role needs someone who is close to a Data Analyst and is comfortable using PowerBI or Tableau, but prefer PowerBI. Need someone who can has the ability to tell a story with the data. Rule out candidates who are heavy in processing, not what is needed. Focus needs to be on a BI background but also knowledge of SQL.\xa0', 'o Experience in distributed code repositories such as Git (Gitlab/Github/Bitbucket)', 'o Build APIs to export data for consumption by external applications.', 'o Experience with REST API to build automation of web services', 'o Define end-to-end architecture for data ingestion, storage, processing and visualization.', 'o Follow the best practices for code development and code hygiene using Gitlab.', 'o Experience with data analytics or visualization software such as PowerBI, Tableau or Qlik', 'o Excellent written and verbal communication skills', 'o Build and implement data model and schema for data analytics and the reporting applications', 'o Leverage off-the-shelf reporting and visualization tools (Tableau, PowerBI) as much possible to build reports and when necessary build custom UI', 'o Ensure that the scale and performance of the data reporting queries meet the SLOs', 'o Experience in SQL and complex database query development and procedures', 'Duration: 6+ months', 'o Build smart connectors to ingest data from variety of data sources, including structured and unstructured data.', 'o Setup and operationalize the infrastructure to deploy and run the analytics applications.', 'o Experience in development framework such node.js (preferred) and react/angular.js.', 'BI/Data Analyst', 'Visa Status: USC or GC(Only W2)', 'Essential Requirements:', 'Talent Acquisition Expert', 'Location : Remote', 'o Maintain documentation and user guides in Confluence', 'o Results-driven and accountability-minded', 'o Strong analytical, process management and reporting skills', 'abhilash@prijbs.com', 'o Ability and desire to learn new skills', 'o Follow Scrum process, participate in Scrum ceremonies and follow the incremental delivery model', 'o Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or a related field']

job_title: Healthcare Data Analyst I - Quality Systems
job_text: ['', ' Develops and prepares reports to support IEHP’s clinical and provider units utilizing available analytics and data mining tools, including but not limited to: Microsoft Applications (including MS Access), SAS, SPSS, Crystal Reports, system-specific reporting tools (e.g., MedHOK, CRM,) or other related reporting software.', 'Preferred Experience', ' Demonstrate a commitment to incorporate LEAN principles into daily work.', ' Document all analysis / reporting projects following established protocols, ensuring replication of results by an independent reviewer.', ' Establish and maintain effective working relationships with others throughout the organization.', ' Develops and prepares reports to support IEHP’s clinical and provider units utilizing available analytics and data mining tools, including but not limited to: Microsoft Applications (including MS Access), SAS, SPSS, Crystal Reports, system-specific reporting tools (e.g., MedHOK, CRM,) or other related reporting software. Exercises timely and accurate data mining techniques and develops new or modifies existing reports that ensure consistent conclusions to data analysis. Use analytical skills to determine solutions and resolve problems Responsible for evaluating report requests to determine requestor’s needs and objectives, identifying correct methodology for extracting data including data sources and criteria, and ensuring the delivered report is accurate, timely, and formatted appropriately. Responsible for understanding the various data sources available within IEHP for reporting and analysis, as well as a clear understanding of IEHP business operations to be able to appropriately guide the development of quality program activities, including analysis and reporting. Significant participation in analysis, interpretation, and translating of complex health plan data, issues, trends, and relationships into effective strategies and action plans. Responsible for managing assigned projects and effectively communicating with the QS leadership team any project deadlines that may be in jeopardy of being met, well in advance of the due date. Document all analysis / reporting projects following established protocols, ensuring replication of results by an independent reviewer. Demonstrate a commitment to incorporate LEAN principles into daily work. Establish and maintain effective working relationships with others throughout the organization.', 'Starting Salary:', 'Preferred Education', ' Responsible for managing assigned projects and effectively communicating with the QS leadership team any project deadlines that may be in jeopardy of being met, well in advance of the due date.', ' Significant participation in analysis, interpretation, and translating of complex health plan data, issues, trends, and relationships into effective strategies and action plans.', 'Education Qualifications', ' Exercises timely and accurate data mining techniques and develops new or modifies existing reports that ensure consistent conclusions to data analysis.', ' Use analytical skills to determine solutions and resolve problems', 'Experience Qualifications', 'Major Functions (Duties And Responsibilities)', 'Job Requisition ID:', ' Responsible for understanding the various data sources available within IEHP for reporting and analysis, as well as a clear understanding of IEHP business operations to be able to appropriately guide the development of quality program activities, including analysis and reporting.', ' Responsible for evaluating report requests to determine requestor’s needs and objectives, identifying correct methodology for extracting data including data sources and criteria, and ensuring the delivered report is accurate, timely, and formatted appropriately.']

['', 'Personal Statement— explain in 1,000 words or less why you want to work in the area of data science and analytics in defense and national security and how your background/experience will contribute to IDA’s workWriting Sample—5,000 word maximumTranscripts\xa0- unofficial transcript is acceptable for consideration, but an official transcript is needed before any offer of employment will be madeTwo Letters of Academic Recommendation—letters must be signed by the individual rendering the reference and delivered as PDF files.', 'The Institute for Defense Analyses (IDA) is a not-for-profit corporation that operates three Federally Funded Research Centers (FFRDCs). IDA’s Systems and Analyses Center is located in Alexandria, Virginia and is comprised of eight research divisions providing objective analyses of national security issues, particularly those requiring scientific and technical expertise, and conducts related research on other national challenges.\xa0', 'This is a full time position and is only open to recent recipients of a bachelor’s or master’s degree. Candidates with degrees higher than a master’s degree will not be considered.', 'Appraisal of current DoD investments in a broad range of areas: from human factors to autonomous systems, from materials science to nuclear weapons effects, from social behaviors to quantum computing;', 'Involvement in workshops and discussions on relevant topics', 'Two Letters of Academic Recommendation', 'Experience or coursework in Bayesian statistics, machine learning, predictive analytics, and/or geospatial analyses', 'Equal Opportunity Employer', 'Ability to obtain and maintain a security clearance is required', 'Training on specific analytical methods and tools', 'Fellows will have an opportunity to work research questions in areas such as:', 'Analyze and research questions on DoD personnel, military readiness and efficacy, and organizational efficiency topics.', 'Experience with GPU, high-throughput, and/or distributed computing', 'Candidates must demonstrate strong written and oral communication skills. Ideal candidates are able to contribute to and support team efforts.', 'Transcripts', 'Assessment of federal agency information and computing architectures that support data science applications (i.e., large, distributed data sets and computational assets);', 'Over the course of the three-year program, fellowship experiences will include:', 'Appraisal of current DoD investments in a broad range of areas: from human factors to autonomous systems, from materials science to nuclear weapons effects, from social behaviors to quantum computing;Analyze and research questions on DoD personnel, military readiness and efficacy, and organizational efficiency topics.Assessment of federal agency information and computing architectures that support data science applications (i.e., large, distributed data sets and computational assets);Application of data exploration, text analytics, forecasting, statistical inference, simulation to areas of military personnel, manpower, and acquisition of DOD weapon systems.', 'Personal Statement— explain in 1,000 words or less why you want to work in the area of data science and analytics in defense and national security and how your background/experience will contribute to IDA’s work', 'In addition to the application, applicants at later stages in the process will be required to submit\xa0the following documents:', 'Writing Sample', 'Involvement in workshops and discussions on relevant topicsMentorship from members of the IDA research staffTraining on specific analytical methods and toolsAttendance and presentation at select professional society meetings', 'Attendance and presentation at select professional society meetings', 'Personal Statement', 'Candidate with recent Bachelor’s degree or Masters’ degree in economics, statistics, operations research, mathematics, physics, computer science, data science, or related disciplines with a strong foundation in statistics and/or applied mathematics are encouraged to apply.', 'Additional preferred skills include:', 'Candidates must demonstrate experience with one or more programming language or statistical software used in research (e.g., Python, R, Julia, Stata, MATLAB, C, Java, etc.)', 'Overview', 'U.S. Citizenship is required', 'Two Letters of Academic Recommendation—letters must be signed by the individual rendering the reference and delivered as PDF files.', 'Transcripts\xa0- unofficial transcript is acceptable for consideration, but an official transcript is needed before any offer of employment will be made', 'Qualifications', 'Experience as a research assistant in an academic or policy research setting', 'Training and/or experience in quantitative or qualitative information collection, data normalization, and text analytics', 'This is a full time position and is only open to recent recipients of a bachelor’s or master’s degree. Candidates with degrees higher than a master’s degree will not be considered.Candidate with recent Bachelor’s degree or Masters’ degree in economics, statistics, operations research, mathematics, physics, computer science, data science, or related disciplines with a strong foundation in statistics and/or applied mathematics are encouraged to apply.Candidates must demonstrate experience with one or more programming language or statistical software used in research (e.g., Python, R, Julia, Stata, MATLAB, C, Java, etc.)Candidates must demonstrate strong written and oral communication skills. Ideal candidates are able to contribute to and support team efforts.Additional preferred skills include:Training and/or experience in quantitative or qualitative information collection, data normalization, and text analyticsExperience as a research assistant in an academic or policy research settingExperience or coursework in Bayesian statistics, machine learning, predictive analytics, and/or geospatial analysesExperience with GPU, high-throughput, and/or distributed computingU.S. citizenship is required.', 'Mentorship from members of the IDA research staff', 'U.S. citizenship is required.', 'Application of data exploration, text analytics, forecasting, statistical inference, simulation to areas of military personnel, manpower, and acquisition of DOD weapon systems.', 'The IDA Data Science Fellowship provides recent graduates a unique opportunity to develop and apply data science skills to important issues in national security.\xa0\xa0Data Science Fellows will investigate the ways machine learning, artificial intelligence, statistics, and big data methodologies contribute to national security and gain experience developing advanced data science tools They will use their critical thinking and analytic skills to work on challenging real-world national security issues.\xa0In a collaborative team environment, Fellows perform data manipulation and statistical, econometric, predictive, descriptive, and other quantitative analyses to answer national security-related research questions. Fellows should expect to learn while creatively contributing to interdisciplinary project teams.', 'Writing Sample—5,000 word maximum']

['', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Capable of fundamental programming SAS, R, SUDAAN, STATA or other statistical software for data analysis, survey data analysis, and data management ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Familiarity with data management software packages (e.g. R, REDCap, Microsoft Access, Excel, EpiInfo, STATA, etc.) ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Perform daily/weekly data runs and create daily/weekly reports ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Trouble shoot issues with daily/weekly data runs ', 'GDIT is hiring Senior Scientific Data Analysts to provide support to the Epidemiology Task Force: Ongoing COVID-19 Response Support. Due to the recent events caused by the COVID-19 pandemic, the CDC Epidemiology Task Force is responsible for identifying and tracking COVID-19 cases, spread and containment. The COVID-19 Epidemiology Task Force Response is critical to accomplishing the CDC’s mission and goals during the COVID-19 pandemic. This position will give support across several teams within the task force. ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Manage data stored in a variety of file formats such as SAS datasets, Microsoft Access, Microsoft Excel, SQL, and ASCII files ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Work with internal CDC staff/programs to push data to interactive public-facing website on weekly basis. ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Support the design, development, and implementation of surveillance tools to collect epidemiologic data ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Perform data quality assurance activities, including identifying and resolving any inconsistencies in data flow, data outside legitimate ranges, and illogical data responses by developing data quality reports and investigation and resolution of data anomalies or errors by using a combination of software packages including SAS or R, MS Access and Excel, and other software (e.g. REDCap) ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Manage epidemiological and laboratory data by using SAS or equivalent statistical package (e.g. R) ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Prepare summary tables and descriptive analyses of results on a regular basis ', 'QUALIFICATIONS: ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Contribute to production of study/surveillance summaries or manuscripts for publication. ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Conducts weekly data cleaning and generate weekly error reports ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Compile individual-level data submitted from multiple external partners in diverse data formats and merge with laboratory testing results from CDC or contract laboratories ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Experience on an outbreak response in any capacity', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Conduct analyses including frequencies, longitudinal data analysis, and univariate and multivariate modeling techniques (linear regression, logistic regression, generalized linear models, and survival analysis) ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Responsible for tracking of problem resolution related to data quality assurance activities by maintaining data-correction logbooks and/or files in order to improve the quality of the data collection/acquisition process ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Assist researchers in developing analytical programs in SAS or R and assist researchers in determining the appropriate statistical techniques to apply to their analyses ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Have the necessary resources, skills, and materials to support the following data management lifecycle activities: execute the coordination of data entry processes, create data entry forms in software packages such as Microsoft Access and REDCap and perform data entry as required ', "If this sounds like something you'd be interested in, please send resumes to Lindsey Moltz at lmoltz@apexsystems.com.\xa0PRIOR CDC EXPERIENCE IS REQUIRED! ", '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Determine how to best present age/sex/race adjusted estimates in daily/weekly reports, describe and work to minimize biases related to missingness of key variables such as race/ethnicity ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Track completeness and quality of data over time ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Create and modify SAS (or other) programs used for data management and create documentation for programs describing their functions and associated processes and output ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Monitor data submissions from research study partners ', 'Emergency Response Coordinator\xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 REQ ID: 1078160', 'Desired Skills and Experience:', 'A scientific data analyst has the necessary education and work experiences to effectively provide data analysis, data management, and data visualization provide additional support to the task force. ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Work on ongoing basis to improve and automate code ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 MPH with a concentration in Epidemiology or Biostatistics with 2+ years of work experience ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 CDC experience ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Determine sampling methodologies to implement if case counts exceed certain thresholds, characterize surveillance back-fill to help with real-time interpretation of data ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Bachelor’s degree with 4+ years of relevant experience ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Provide data cleaning and management support for research studies and surveillance platforms ', ' ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Coordinating or participating in routine study or surveillance meetings, possibly including taking study minutes and preparing materials on study progress. ', 'Required Skills and Experience ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Communicate analytic results to internal CDC staff and external partners in a clear, concise and timely manner ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Explore the use of data visualization platforms (e.g. R, Power BI, mapping software) to quickly summarize study findings ', 'Desired Skills and Experience: ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Ensure the security and confidentiality of analytical data files and provide data file documentation describing the scientific data source. ', 'RESPONSIBILITIES (vary with years of relevant experience and education):', 'PRIOR CDC EXPERIENCE IS REQUIRED!', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Database management and upkeep as well as complete ad hoc data requests ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Manipulate and transform data that are stored in a variety of file formats ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Support study planning, protocol development, and study logistics, possibly including developing and keeping task trackers, protocol organization, organization of study documents (e.g. SOPs, forms, reports, etc.), and preparing study-related materials and overviews ', 'RESPONSIBILITIES (vary with years of relevant experience and education): ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Convert datasets from multiple different sources into SAS datasets ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Support data visualization activities (both for hypothesis generation and to share data with the response) in order to develop communication materials such as data sets, slide sets and summary reports ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 M.S. in statistics or mathematics with 2+ years of work experience ', 'Emergency Response Coordinator\xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 REQ ID: 1078160 ']

Interactions are initiated both in person or electronically and focus on data and reporting.', " Nvoicepay Headquarters, Beaverton, ORRole DescriptionThe Data Analyst II position is responsible for the gathering, cleaning, management, storage and analysis of data from a variety of sources to assist with the sales process, customer onboarding, supplier enablement, business and financial analysis and service assessment. Data, process and results affect all areas of our business and must be based on tried and replicable processes and reporting. This senior role requires independent evaluation and completion of projects, complete life cycle data generation and reporting with business analysis and work on complex projects that span areas of business.Main Responsibilities Interpret data, analyze results using statistical techniques and provide ongoing reports. Develop and interpret subset databases, data collection systems, data analytics and other strategies that optimize statistical efficiency and quality. Acquire data from Nvoicepay’s data sources and maintain databases/data systems. Work independently on projects and report on findings using business analysis. Use statistical and defined methods to identify, analyze, and interpret trends or patterns in complex data sets. Make recommendations based on interpretations. Filter and scrub data by reviewing generated reports, printouts, and performance indicators to locate and correct code problems or gather data subsets based on specific criteria; utilize data management tools. Use clean data to create reports for business analysis, Product, Sales, Finance and Operations. Collaborate with teams to identify new data visualization methods, reports and tools. Develop methods for seamlessly gathering, organizing and outputting data based on business need. Work with management to prioritize business and information needs. Identify and define new process improvement opportunities; work with development team to improve data collection and management. ['', '• 3-5 years of experience in assay development and improvement process in a quality system environment.', '• Develops research plan, design experiments and outline research procedures to be followed;', '• Conducts research using laboratory equipment, computer resources and libraries;', '• Knowledge of conducting clinical trial study and FDA 510K submission.', '• Provide knowledge and support of electrochemical biosensor development; and', '• Must be able to use Excel program to present data and do basic statistical analysis;', 'years experience in a Scientist role in the IVD industry.', '• Investigates and develops new methods for solving complex technical problems;', '• Develop projects from early development, product transfer, manufacturing and clinical studies', 'The successful candidate will be responsible for designing and conducting research & development studies. This person will also participate in decision making regarding research priorities for effective and efficient product development progression; analyze data and recommend further study direction.', '• Plans research schedule according to timetable and establishes daily or weekly routines necessary to meet the timetable;', 'Scientist-Direct Hire-San Diego', '• Identifies and provides training to subordinate personnel to carry out research;', '• Assists RA department for 510K submission;', '• Experience in molecular biology is a plus.', '• Must be able to manage project and timelines effectively, organize work priorities and effectively interact with other team members;', '• Participates in decision making regarding research priorities of the department and provides information on feasibility of prospective projects;', 'The essential duties/responsibilities for this position are:', '• Experience in immunoassay development with instrument read;', '• Performs and reports analysis of data to monitor.', '• Ph.D. in chemistry, biochemistry or related, or a combination of Bachelor’s degree and 3-5', '• phases;', '• Provides expertise in field of research to other department members;', '• Must have experience on lateral flow and fluorescence immunoassay;', 'Requirements of the position:']

['', 'Contribute to a positive and exciting work environment, contributing to a\xa0strong, entrepreneurial and creative culture.', 'Strong experimental skills, including tissue culture, human/mouse immune cell culture and functional assays, multi-color flow cytometry, ELISA/MSD, qPCR, immunoassay development, and preclinical model species (mouse/NHP) tissue processing and ex vivo analysis.\xa0', 'Detail oriented and self-motivated, willingness to take on new challenges', 'Passionate, adaptable scientist looking to make an impact in a biotech startup environment', 'We are seeking an exceptional researcher to join an RNA therapeutics startup as a Research Associate/Senior Research Associate to evaluate candidate therapies for the treatment of cancer and autoimmune diseases. The ideal candidate is an immunologist with molecular and/or cellular training with experience using gain-of-function techniques (transgenes, gene therapy, gene editing) to engineer immune cells to create therapeutic candidates. The ideal candidate has at least a bachelor’s degree in an immunology-related field with relevant in vitro and in vivo laboratory experience in the pharmaceutical or biotech industry. They will be able to quickly\xa0learn and integrate new protocols into existing workflows, possess strong oral and written communication capabilities, demonstrate excellent collaboration and interpersonal skills, and be adept at problem solving in a fast-paced environment.', 'Ability to solve technical problems in a logical and rationale manner.', 'Effectively communicate experimental plans and data; present to cross-functional R+D teams.\xa0', 'Technical experience in the fields of immunology, autoimmunity, or cancer immunotherapy', 'Evaluating oRNA constructs and formulations in in-house animal models', 'Evaluating oRNA constructs and formulation in relevant human and animal cell lines', '\xa0', 'Maintain an electronic notebook record of performed studies.', 'Design, plan, and execute scientific experiments under the supervision of a senior immunologist.', 'Expand our therapeutic pipeline by:', 'BS in biology, immunology, or related discipline with 2+ years of relevant laboratory experience in the pharmaceutical or biotechnology industry.', 'Generate, interpret, and analyze data with a sense of urgency.', 'Evaluating oRNA constructs to express proteins of interest', 'Qualifications', 'Develop functional and phenotypic in vitro and ex vivo immune assays with human/animal material under the supervision of a senior immunologist.', 'Self-motivated, detail oriented, and manage multiple parallel laboratory activities; effectively manage time.', 'Effective written and oral communication skills with experience working in cross-functional teams', 'Responsibilities']

['', 'Location: Boston, Massachusetts', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Background in genetics or biology is a plus', 'Job Qualifications', 'Interested candidates should forward a resume and cover letter to careers-US@monterosatx.com', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Knowledge of cancer genomics is a plus but is NOT required\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Ph.D. in Computer Science, Physics, Statistics, Math, Engineering, or a related quantitative discipline', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Flexibility to accommodate to rapidly changing priorities and deadlines', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Present ideas and results to the Data Science team. Prepare written reports and presentations for internal and external use', 'Monte Rosa Therapeutics is a rapidly growing startup company headquartered in Boston, MA with additional laboratory facilities in Basel, Switzerland. We are seeking a highly motivated and talented individual with a strong computational and analytical background to join our Data Science team in Boston. The candidate will be a highly creative computational biologist/ data scientist with strong programming and data analysis background and an ambition to tackle high-impact complex computational biology problems involving large-scale biological and pharmacological datasets. The successful candidate will work closely with a world-class team of scientists to develop the next generation of protein degraders in a highly dynamic and collaborative environment. In this position, you will have the opportunity to push the boundaries of science and help to accelerate the discovery of new therapeutics for cancer and beyond.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Together with other team members, you will develop and advance the Monte Rosa in-silico target identification and virtual screening engine', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Ability to work in a team-based environment', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Develop and maintain analytical and data visualization pipelines for next generation sequencing, proteomics, and pharmacological data', 'Monte Rosa Therapeutics rational approach in targeting disease-causing proteins for degradation will deliver pioneering therapies for cancer and other diseases. Delivering this new generation of treatments to the patients requires a conceptual change.\xa0Monte Rosa recognizes this urgent need and is missioned to develop innovative protein degraders as a solution. Combining deep knowledge, insight and leading-edge science, our integrated engine is built for that purpose.', '\xa0Scientist, Bioinformatics - Cancer Discovery', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with computational analysis, algorithm development, statistics, and machine learning', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Design and execute data analysis strategies to support research projects involving multimodal datasets', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Support the in-vitro and in-vivo experimental design, data analysis and data visualization', '\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Excellent oral and written communication skills', 'Principal Duties and Responsibilities', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with high throughput computing or cloud computing platforms', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Strong programming background; Proficiency in at least one modern programming language; Experience with a scientific programming environment, such as python, R, or Matlab', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Analyze public clinical and preclinical datasets (e.g. TCGA, GENIE, CCLE and DepMap) to prioritize drug targets and identify patient populations']

['Responsibilities:\xa0 ', '', 'Set up automation in the data flow with the Media vendors to expand capabilities to bridge digital customer data (site interactions, digital engagement, etc.) with core customer data. ', 'Relevant data and analysis experience, and work experience in dealing with complex data environment. ', 'Perform complex data analysis in support of ad-hoc and standing requests and demand for insights and be able to present results to non-technical audiences. ', 'Working knowledge of mainstream marketing analytics tool, including Omniture/Adobe Analytics, and Google Analytics. ', 'A key part of this role will be to expand the capabilities of bridging customer information from intricate internal and external data sources, including digital customer data (such as site interactions and digital engagement data from third parties, e.g. Google, Adobe, Facebook, etc.), and internal core customer data (policy datamart, quote datamart, claims datamart, etc.). As we continue to expand our digital capabilities, it is crucial to integrate our data analysis to better understand our customers. ', 'Build a reliable attribution model using stochastic modeling approach, such as Markov Chain, to capture the effectiveness of digital campaigns in various channels. ', 'Master Degree in Business Analytics, Statistics, Applied Mathematics or similar required', 'As part of the Marketing Analytics & Reporting team at Plymouth Rock Assurance, this position will play a critical role in extending Plymouth Rock’s digital data analytics and reporting capabilities. The Senior Marketing Data Analyst is responsible for customer and prospect interaction analysis, attribution models for eSales program, digital campaign and mobile app program analysis.  The analyst will be an expert resource on all digital marketing related data analysis and reporting. The role is also responsible for producing ad hoc analysis on a wide variety of insurance and marketing topics as necessary. ', 'Requirements: ', 'Use SQL and SAS to mine large relational database to drive data-oriented insights, such as sales trends, loss trends, business mix, standard vs nonstandard policies, as well as provide customer behavior insights and overall insurance book trends. ', 'Excellent analytical, critical thinking and problem-solving skills. Excellent technical skills: expert SQL, experience with a statistical processing language (R, Python), and experience with a data visualization / BI tool (Tableau). Relevant data and analysis experience, and work experience in dealing with complex data environment. Proficient at statistical modeling, especially regression model and logistic model. Working knowledge of mainstream marketing analytics tool, including Omniture/Adobe Analytics, and Google Analytics. Ability to communicate effectively at all levels (including executive team) and articulate ideas, analysis results, and recommendations. Ability to prioritize work independently, ensuring accuracy while meeting rigid deadlines. ', 'Analyze website and mobile app data on traffic sources and patterns. Provide insight on data trends and anomalies, making recommendations where appropriate to improve business performance. ', 'Coordinate with cross functional teams, Product, Claims, and IT Team, and build relationships with business users of the data to support their requirements through effective communication, data governance and documentation. ', 'Conduct data profiling and data quality analytics. ', 'Excellent technical skills: expert SQL, experience with a statistical processing language (R, Python), and experience with a data visualization / BI tool (Tableau). ', 'Build and enhance existing reports, and develop new reporting products in Excel, Tableau, and Salesforce Service Cloud. ', ' ', 'Proficient at statistical modeling, especially regression model and logistic model. ', 'Stay up-to-date with data-driven technologies to keep us ahead of the competition, including new innovations in tracking social media marketing efforts, sales attributions, and related AI applications. ', 'Develop sales and KPI forecast for a broad range of marketing campaigns and programs, report periodically on performance against the forecast. ', 'Excellent analytical, critical thinking and problem-solving skills. ', 'Develop and maintain digital marketing and ecommerce site performance reports by using SQL and Adobe Analytics. ', 'Create model-driven customer segmentations for current customers, prospect customers, and agency customers. ', 'Use SQL and SAS to mine large relational database to drive data-oriented insights, such as sales trends, loss trends, business mix, standard vs nonstandard policies, as well as provide customer behavior insights and overall insurance book trends. Analyze website and mobile app data on traffic sources and patterns. Provide insight on data trends and anomalies, making recommendations where appropriate to improve business performance. Create model-driven customer segmentations for current customers, prospect customers, and agency customers. Design A/B digital marketing test models, analyze, and report outcomes of marketing tests. Conduct analysis related to the quality of leads, quotes, and sales from different marketing programs, by integrating both internal data in multiple business data marts and external data from partners, and developing in depth analysis to evaluate the effectiveness of each initiative. Develop sales and KPI forecast for a broad range of marketing campaigns and programs, report periodically on performance against the forecast. Perform complex data analysis in support of ad-hoc and standing requests and demand for insights and be able to present results to non-technical audiences. Coordinate with cross functional teams, Product, Claims, and IT Team, and build relationships with business users of the data to support their requirements through effective communication, data governance and documentation. Develop and maintain digital marketing and ecommerce site performance reports by using SQL and Adobe Analytics. Build a reliable attribution model using stochastic modeling approach, such as Markov Chain, to capture the effectiveness of digital campaigns in various channels. Set up automation in the data flow with the Media vendors to expand capabilities to bridge digital customer data (site interactions, digital engagement, etc.) with core customer data. Build and enhance existing reports, and develop new reporting products in Excel, Tableau, and Salesforce Service Cloud. Conduct data profiling and data quality analytics. Stay up-to-date with data-driven technologies to keep us ahead of the competition, including new innovations in tracking social media marketing efforts, sales attributions, and related AI applications. ', 'Minimum 3-5 years of relevant analytics experience, ideally in a tech savvy company ', 'Ability to communicate effectively at all levels (including executive team) and articulate ideas, analysis results, and recommendations. ', 'Minimum 3-5 years of relevant analytics experience, ideally in a tech savvy company Master Degree in Business Analytics, Statistics, Applied Mathematics or similar required', 'Education & Experience: ', 'Design A/B digital marketing test models, analyze, and report outcomes of marketing tests. ', '\xa0 ', 'Education & Experience:', 'Responsibilities:', 'Requirements:', 'Conduct analysis related to the quality of leads, quotes, and sales from different marketing programs, by integrating both internal data in multiple business data marts and external data from partners, and developing in depth analysis to evaluate the effectiveness of each initiative. ', 'Ability to prioritize work independently, ensuring accuracy while meeting rigid deadlines. ']

['Location: ', 'Duration: ', 'Responsibilities:', 'Here are the job details:Title: Data AnalystLocation: San Francisco, CA (Remote)Duration: 3 Months (20hrs/ Week)This is not a typical Data Analyst position, it is really a Google Analytics and software testing position. Please read carefully.Clients Cloud delivers an industry-leading Digital Experience Platform (DXP) that allows customers to build sophisticated websites that integrate seamlessly with the Salesforce platform. We are looking for an expert in Google Analytics to help us ensure smooth integration of Google Analytics with a new version of our DXP. This is a part-time contractor role and can be performed completely remote, although Pacific time zone is preferred.Skills required:-At least 3 years experience deploying Google Analytics on a number of different web site platforms for large enterprise customers-Complete familiarity with all GA features, sufficient to produce a test plan that covers all GA functionality-At least 3 years experience managing Google Analytics in order to understand web site performance, in order to meet marketing, IT or other business goals in complex enterprises-Experience deploying Google Analytics both directly and via Google Tag Manager-Understanding of how GA is used standalone vs with GTM-Working knowledge of HTML/CSS/Javascript--enough to maintain a test website and insert Google Analytics tags and code both directly and via GTMResponsibilities:-Use your extensive knowledge of Google Analytics to develop a test plan that covers all the commonly-used GA features and functionality, making sure that realistic business use cases are included-Install GA into a test website that we will provide, built on our DXP-Execute your test plan against the website and log any issues found-Help us confirm that Google Analytics works as expected with the provided website/platformThis position is perfect for an individual who has both deep Google Analytics experience and web site skills, but also a software testing/development mindset. It is not a typical GA implementation in that instead of solving specific analytics use cases, the goal is to test *all* use cases/features of GA.JavascriptHTML', 'Here are the job details:Title: ', 'Here are the job details:', 'Skills required:']

job_title: TS/SCI - Senior Data Scientist – Computer Vision/ML/High Performance Computing
job_text: ['', '\xa0Your Profile:', 'Prototyping, development, and testing of complex mathematical models to facilitate and identify attributes and anomalies.Machine learning techniques, statistical, and predictive modeling, task automation, data analytics, computer vision, and natural language processing.Development and testing of methods to combine models to improve accuracy, and automation.Constant innovating around new models to solve new problems', 'Proficiency in Python – Design, Build and Deploy', 'Machine learning and statistical method Exposure, Ensemble learning Exposure', 'Machine learning techniques, statistical, and predictive modeling, task automation, data analytics, computer vision, and natural language processing.', 'MS/Ph.D. preferred in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Mathematics, Neuroscience, Physics, Electrical Engineering, or related fieldProficiency in Python – Design, Build and DeployPyTorch or Tensor Flow Exposure\xa0Computer vision exposure; object recognition/interaction taggingEmbedded/mobile systems design exposureExperience designing and implementing new algorithmsMachine learning and statistical method Exposure, Ensemble learning ExposureYou are in Austin, Texas or already planning to relocate hereYou hold US CitizenshipSecret Security clearance or ideally a TS/SCI Clearance ', 'Responsibilities you will take on:', '***This position requires US Citizenship & an active Secret Security clearance. ***', 'MS/Ph.D. preferred in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Mathematics, Neuroscience, Physics, Electrical Engineering, or related field', 'Experience designing and implementing new algorithms', 'If you are currently open to new opportunities and want to take your career to the next level, please contact me to discuss this opportunity along with alternative Data Science HPC/ML positions within the Austin Computer Software Technology Space.', 'You are in Austin, Texas or already planning to relocate here', 'PyTorch or Tensor Flow Exposure\xa0', 'Secret Security clearance or ideally a TS/SCI Clearance ', 'Embedded/mobile systems design exposure', 'You hold US Citizenship', 'Are you ready for a highly collaborative and mission-critical environment?', 'Your Profile:', '***This position requires US Citizenship & an active Secret Security clearance. ***\xa0', 'Computer vision exposure; object recognition/interaction tagging', 'Constant innovating around new models to solve new problems', 'All conversations are confidential, and we will only submit your information after attaining your consent.', 'Development and testing of methods to combine models to improve accuracy, and automation.', 'Prototyping, development, and testing of complex mathematical models to facilitate and identify attributes and anomalies.', 'As a TS/SCI Senior Data Scientist, you will be responsible for in-depth analysis and predictive modeling in conjunction with extremely sensitive mission-critical data. Development and support of performant pipelines Hands on experience on AWS serverless stack (Lambda, S3, API Gateway, SQS/SNS, Cloudwatch Consolidation of different sources of data (API, SQL Database, CSV, S3 and ftp files etc) into a centralized data store. job_title: Sr. Staff Data Analyst for Marketing
job_text: ['', 'Collaborate with Advanced Analytics, Data Science, and Data Engineering teams to implement predictive models into various stages of marketing funnels, particularly in adapting modern analytics techniques to offline marketing channels such as direct mail and linear television.', 'Fast, continued growth – there’s a lot of opportunity for advancementVoted a Best Place to Work multiple times by our employeesBenefits start within 30 days401k with employer match3 weeks’ paid vacation (increased with tenure)9 paid holidays & 5 sick daysPaid time off for volunteer work and on your birthday', 'Description', 'Care (for everyone): ', ' WHY JOIN THE FREEDOM FAMILY?', 'COLLABORATE (with everybody): We strive to work together toward a common purpose by proactively sharing information and inviting participation. We recognize the perspective of various groups and embrace healthy, constructive debate.', '6+ years of hands-on analytic experience in the financial services industryHands-on experience in SQL, television.', 'An effective cross functional communicator in both written and verbal skills', 'Analyze DM campaign results to inform future targeting and optimization decisions', 'Act with Integrity job_title: Co-op - Biological Data Science, Summer & Fall 2020
job_text: ['', ' A free shuttle is offered from the North White Plains or Tarrytown train stations to the Tarrytown campus', ' Must be a rising 3rd or 4th year undergraduate student, or a Masters student', ' 17749BR', ' Prefer demonstrated leadership in areas such as campus activities, clubs, sports or the community', ' You will work with a specific manager on a project(s)', ' Some background in life sciences would be helpful but is not required', ' Experience with programming (unix shell, Python, R), databases and biostatics is required', " Must be enrolled in, or accepted to, an academic program pursuing a Bachelor's, Master's, PhD or PharmD", ' Program is full-time (~40 hrs/wk) and is paid', ' Must be pursuing a degree in bioinformatics, biostatistics or equivalent disciplines', ' Enjoy regular 1 hour Co-op Program events: learn about other areas of the company from employees, soft skills workshops, networking, volunteering, and more!', ' Minimum GPA of 3.0', '  17749BR', ' Present to your team on your project(s)', ' Get to know other incoming students on our closed LinkedIn page when you accept an offer']

job_title: Sr. Data Analyst - Supply Chain Management
job_text: ['', 'Experience creating meaningful data visualizations', 'Lead data mining required for accurate spend reporting.', 'Requirements', 'Specific Duties Include, But Are Not Limited To', 'Proactively identify and lead process improvements to data analysis and reporting processes across area of responsibility', 'Strong use and understanding of data visualization, extraction and/or analysis tools, preferably with at least 5 years of experience', 'Coordinate data maintenance required for Oracle. Ariba, or other system (supplier, item, commodity code, etc.).', 'Provide summary and detail trend analysis of spend globally.', 'Strong use and understanding of data visualization, extraction and/or analysis tools, preferably with at least 5 years of experienceThis position will require advanced computer skills with the ability to quickly master emerging technologies.Excellent communication skills are needed to interact with different levels within the company.Preferred experience in Supply Management or Logistics experience to understand terminology and philosophy and how the data can translate into results.', 'Perform routine spend analysis in support of Supply Management sourcing events.', 'Develop and provide reporting for both internal and end customer diversity reporting, contract management, supplier performance, and e-procurement systems.', 'Leverage the latest reporting technology to develop sophisticated dashboards that provide thought-provoking insights and enhance the visibility of direct and indirect spend data', 'This position will require advanced computer skills with the ability to quickly master emerging technologies.', 'Design and run reports for improved spend visibility, compliance and identification of productivity opportunities Distribute reports to senior leaders, division general managers, Supply Management and others as needed', 'Ability to learn, understand, and deploy new reporting and analysis tools', 'Ensure linkage of tools with effective Supply Management and Logistics practices.', 'Build and edit dashboards catered to Supply Management’s KPIs - blending data sources where required', 'Preferred experience in Supply Management or Logistics experience to understand terminology and philosophy and how the data can translate into results.', 'Enforce standardization of supplier and purchased item data.', 'Develop and conduct routine data audits to verify data accuracy. Identify and address root causes of problems with data integrity.', 'Excellent communication skills are needed to interact with different levels within the company.', 'Build and edit dashboards catered to Supply Management’s KPIs - blending data sources where requiredLeverage the latest reporting technology to develop sophisticated dashboards that provide thought-provoking insights and enhance the visibility of direct and indirect spend dataAbility to learn, understand, and deploy new reporting and analysis toolsExperience creating meaningful data visualizationsDesign and run reports for improved spend visibility, compliance and identification of productivity opportunities Distribute reports to senior leaders, division general managers, Supply Management and others as neededEvaluate, implement and deploy new tools to assist in data analytics, market research and other aspects of data analysisProactively identify and lead process improvements to data analysis and reporting processes across area of responsibilityLead data mining required for accurate spend reporting.Coordinate data maintenance required for Oracle. Ariba, or other system (supplier, item, commodity code, etc.).Perform routine spend analysis in support of Supply Management sourcing events.Provide summary and detail trend analysis of spend globally.Develop and provide reporting for both internal and end customer diversity reporting, contract management, supplier performance, and e-procurement systems.Develop and conduct routine data audits to verify data accuracy. Identify and address root causes of problems with data integrity.Enforce standardization of supplier and purchased item data.Ensure linkage of tools with effective Supply Management and Logistics practices.', 'Evaluate, implement and deploy new tools to assist in data analytics, market research and other aspects of data analysis']

['', 'Lead a team of data scientists to leverage data and AI/ML to build data driven products.', 'Proven track record overseeing data science projects at all stages, from initial conception to implementation and optimization.', 'Excellent presentation skills, distilling complex analysis and concepts into concise business-focused takeaways.', 'MS or higher in the field of Statistics, Computer Science, Information Sciences or a quantitative-related field', 'Manage data science projects, track solution development, and deployment of models in real time and offline modes as well as communication of results and performance to Sr leadership.', 'Research new technologies and methods across data science, NLP, Computer Vision, AI and ML to improve the technical capabilities of the team and also bring new process efficiencies.', 'Work with cross-functional partners in product, analytics, engineering, BI, marketing, finance, and Consumer experience to identify trends, new opportunities and achieve business goals. ', 'Deep understanding of machine learning, statistical modeling and data mining techniques including supervised and unsupervised learning, reinforcement learning, natural language processing.', 'Lead a team of data scientists to leverage data and AI/ML to build data driven products.Support the professional growth of the data science team through mentoring, coaching, and technical leadershipBuilding vision and roadmap for the data science team and executing on it.Work with cross-functional partners in product, analytics, engineering, BI, marketing, finance, and Consumer experience to identify trends, new opportunities and achieve business goals. Provide hands on guidance to the team in building predictive models, developing machine learning solutions, designing experiments, and measuring impact.Research new technologies and methods across data science, NLP, Computer Vision, AI and ML to improve the technical capabilities of the team and also bring new process efficiencies.Manage data science projects, track solution development, and deployment of models in real time and offline modes as well as communication of results and performance to Sr leadership.', 'Core Digital Media is focused on empowering people to improve their lives financially.\xa0For the last 20+ years, our websites LowerMyBills, WalletJoy and PolicyPilot has been focused on helping people navigate the world of finances, providing them with savings and money-making opportunities through our relationships with service providers across mortgage, credit cards, loans, insurance, banking, home services and personal finance.', 'Minimum Qualifications:', 'Proven track record of forging relationships with business leaders to identify new business opportunities through data science and implementing them.', '2+ years management experience developing and leading data science teams', 'Core Digital Media is looking for a passionate data science leader to join our data science team. As a leader of the data science team you will be piloting and leading the development and deployment of advanced Statistical and Machine Learning models. You would also be responsible for leading a team of data scientists that will leverage data and AI/ML algorithms to drive business results.\xa0You will be collaborating with different business groups in the organization and will be a trusted liaison between data science and the different groups to identify new business opportunities and integrate data science applications into business processes.', 'Building vision and roadmap for the data science team and executing on it.', '5+ years of experience in data science field with hands on experience in building AI/ML models using Python/R etc and deploying in real time/offline fashion.', 'Experience working with ML libraries like Pytorch, Tensforflow, Scikitlearn, XGBoost etc.', 'Track record of building vision and roadmap for data science teams and executing on them.', 'MS or higher in the field of Statistics, Computer Science, Information Sciences or a quantitative-related field5+ years of experience in data science field with hands on experience in building AI/ML models using Python/R etc and deploying in real time/offline fashion.2+ years management experience developing and leading data science teamsTrack record of building vision and roadmap for data science teams and executing on them.Proven track record of forging relationships with business leaders to identify new business opportunities through data science and implementing them.Proven track record overseeing data science projects at all stages, from initial conception to implementation and optimization.Deep understanding of machine learning, statistical modeling and data mining techniques including supervised and unsupervised learning, reinforcement learning, natural language processing.Excellent presentation skills, distilling complex analysis and concepts into concise business-focused takeaways.Experience working with relational SQL and NoSQL databases and cloud frameworks like AWS, Azure, GCS etc.Experience working with ML libraries like Pytorch, Tensforflow, Scikitlearn, XGBoost etc.', 'Provide hands on guidance to the team in building predictive models, developing machine learning solutions, designing experiments, and measuring impact.', 'Support the professional growth of the data science team through mentoring, coaching, and technical leadership', 'Experience working with relational SQL and NoSQL databases and cloud frameworks like AWS, Azure, GCS etc.', 'Responsibilities:']

job_title: Post Masters RA - Data Science (Machine Learning)
job_text: ['', 'Background Investigation: Applicants selected will be subject to a Federal background investigation and must meet eligibility requirements for access to classified matter in accordance 10 CFR 710, Appendix B.', 'Requirements', 'Proven ability to work independently and to quickly adapt to new scientific environments', 'Ability to contribute that knowledge to the academic and research strength of PNNL and have experience writing scientific publications demonstrating their insight and discovery (e.g., publication in conferences such as NeurIPS, ICML, ICLR, KDD, CVPR, ICCV, ECCV, ACL, ICWSM, EMNLP, NAACL, EACL, COLING, and SIGIR is preferred)', 'Organization and Job ID', 'Job Description', 'Drug Testing: All Security Clearance (L or Q) positions will be considered by the Department of Energy to be Testing Designated Positions which means that they are subject to applicant, random, and for cause drug testing. In addition, applicants must be able to demonstrate non-use of illegal drugs, including marijuana, for the 12 consecutive months preceding completion of the requisite Questionnaire for National Security Positions (QNSP).', ' U.S. Citizenship Background Investigation: Applicants selected will be subject to a Federal background investigation and must meet eligibility requirements for access to classified matter in accordance 10 CFR 710, Appendix B. ', 'Master’s Degree in a Computer Science or related area.', ' Master’s Degree in a Computer Science or related area. job_title: Sr. Scientist/Associate Principal Scientist, Translational Medicine
company: Acerta Pharma B.V. (A member of the AstraZeneca Group)
job_text: ['', 'Publish      work in high quality scientific journals and present at internal/external      scientific meetings. ', 'Work      with cross functional leadership to integrate translational support across      oncology pipeline. ', 'Acerta Pharma is an equal opportunity employer and considers qualified applicants for employment without regard to race, color, creed, religion, national origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity and expression, age, disability, or Vietnam era, or other eligible veteran status, or any other protected factor.', 'Supervising/managing      lab staff may be required. ', 'PhD and/or MD with experience in oncology drug development. Deep knowledge in disease biology/translational science, with experience in pharmaceutical industry with a focus in Hematology-Oncology. Must have expertise in oncology, cancer cell signaling pathways, biomarker assay development, and translational biology research. The ideal candidate should be familiar with several technical methodologies and platforms used for analyzing high-content flow cytometry and genomic data sets (NGS and RNASeq etc). ', 'Will be part of cross-functional clinical study management teams (SMT) to lead biomarker/translational strategy and collaborate with clinical operations teams to implement exploratory sample collection and analyses in clinical studies. ', 'Requirements and Qualifications', 'Must have excellent oral and written communication skills. ', 'Proven experience as an effective scientist and a team      player with great motivation. ', ' Deriving      biomarker strategies based on biology data (internal/external datasets)      and implementing within project teams.  Must      be able to lead cross-functional biomarker teams to oversee the delivery      of biomarker/diagnostic strategy and interpreting the data related to      individual research/clinical development projects.  ', 'Experience in building partnerships and leveraging relationships with cross functional teams. ', 'Should be able to own      and contribute to the biomarker/diagnostic related sections in the      clinical study protocols, CSRs, and biomarker analysis plans/reports etc. ', 'Lead      external academic collaborations on novel biomarker/combination focus. ', 'Deriving      biomarker strategies based on biology data (internal/external datasets)      and implementing within project teams. ', ' ', 'PhD and/or MD with experience in oncology drug development. ', 'Must have expertise in oncology, cancer cell signaling pathways, biomarker assay development, and translational biology research. ', 'Deep knowledge in disease biology/translational science, with experience in pharmaceutical industry with a focus in Hematology-Oncology. ', ' Proven experience as an effective scientist and a team      player with great motivation.  Should be able to fit into a fast-paced work      environment with changing project priorities.  ', 'We are seeking a highly motivated scientist to join a world class center for discovery and development of innovative cancer medicines at Acerta Pharma, an AstraZeneca Company, based in South San Francisco, CA. The successful candidate will be reporting to the Head of the Translational Medicine Group and will be responsible to deliver the translational strategies across a portfolio of medicines in various stages of clinical development in hematology-oncology. ', 'Should be able to fit into a fast-paced work      environment with changing project priorities. ', 'Must      be able to lead cross-functional biomarker teams to oversee the delivery      of biomarker/diagnostic strategy and interpreting the data related to      individual research/clinical development projects. ', 'Experience working with primary human clinical trial samples. Experience in building partnerships and leveraging relationships with cross functional teams. Able to work independently with minimal supervision. Must have excellent oral and written communication skills. ', 'Key Responsibilities', 'Understanding      novel mechanisms of resistance to targeted therapies. ', 'Experience working with primary human clinical trial samples. ', ' Lead      external academic collaborations on novel biomarker/combination focus.  Should be able to own      and contribute to the biomarker/diagnostic related sections in the      clinical study protocols, CSRs, and biomarker analysis plans/reports etc.  Collaborate      with cross functional teams (global working teams) including biology,      translational medicine, and clinical operations etc.  Understanding      novel mechanisms of resistance to targeted therapies.  Work      with cross functional leadership to integrate translational support across      oncology pipeline.  Publish      work in high quality scientific journals and present at internal/external      scientific meetings.  Supervising/managing      lab staff may be required.  ', 'The ideal candidate should be familiar with several technical methodologies and platforms used for analyzing high-content flow cytometry and genomic data sets (NGS and RNASeq etc). ', 'Disclaimer: The above statements are intended to describe the general nature and level of work being performed by people assigned to this classification. They are not to be constructed as an exhaustive list of all responsibilities, duties, and skills required of personnel so classified. All personnel may be required to perform duties outside of their normal responsibilities from time to time, as needed. ', 'Measure pharmacodynamic markers reliably and quantifiably to inform clinical decisions for selecting therapeutically relevant dose/schedules. ', 'Collaborate      with cross functional teams (global working teams) including biology,      translational medicine, and clinical operations etc. ', 'Able to work independently with minimal supervision. ']
