['', 'We share your concern about COVID-19 and its impact on our greater community. This is an evolving public health situation that Character Lab is actively monitoring. We are following the guidance of the CDC and local public health departments. As such, our team has shifted to working from home and we are conducting all of our interviews virtually. We are committed to working with all candidates throughout the interview process who may need reasonable accommodations, including those who may need support with virtual technology.', 'Ensuring quality communication and strong relationships with researchers', 'Identifying opportunities for increased efficiency', 'A high level of thoroughness and attention to detail, in order to maintain our high quality of work', 'Prior experience with data management', 'Managing IRB protocols and grant proposals', 'Prolonged and irregular hours of duty, as necessary', 'Founded in 2013 by two educators (Dave Levin and Dominic Randolph) and one scientist (Angela Duckworth), Character Lab is a nonprofit dedicated to advancing scientific insights that help kids thrive. By connecting researchers with educators, Character Lab seeks to create greater knowledge about the conditions that lead to social, emotional, academic, and physical well-being for young people throughout the country. To learn more, go to www.characterlab.org.', 'Research suggests that character encompasses a multitude of strengths that can be organized into three dimensions: strengths of heart (interpersonal), like gratitude, enable harmonious relationships with other people; strengths of will (intrapersonal), like grit and self-control, enable achievement; and strengths of mind (intellectual), like curiosity, enable independent thinking.', 'Liaising between researchers and school district data teams', 'Compensation and Benefits', 'Job Requirements', 'Maintaining attention to detail and accuracy in all tasks', 'Fierce work ethic and sense of purpose, with the ability to work well as part of a dynamic start-up', 'About Character Lab', 'Prolonged and irregular hours of duty, as necessarySome light to medium level of manual labor (e.g., preparing mailings, moving boxes of materials)', 'Some light to medium level of manual labor (e.g., preparing mailings, moving boxes of materials)', 'Facilitating the work of top tier scientists', 'Creating operational procedures for data management', '3+ years work experience', 'Physical Demands/Environmental Factors', 'Bachelor’s in Psychology, Education, Statistics, Economics or a related social sciences field, Master’s preferred3+ years work experienceSignificant experience in social science research, with a strong passion for education; prior experience working in education a plus but not requiredPrior experience with data managementPrior experience managing external vendors or consultants a plusExcellent project and time management skillsProficiency in at least one programming language a plus (Python, Matlab, Stata, C#, and/or R)A high level of thoroughness and attention to detail, in order to maintain our high quality of workFierce work ethic and sense of purpose, with the ability to work well as part of a dynamic start-upHighly effective interpersonal communication, collaboration, and writing skills', 'Prior experience managing external vendors or consultants a plus', 'Our culture is both challenging (we’re never done improving) and supportive (one of our core values is excessive generosity). To learn more, check out our culture book: https://characterlab.org/wp-content/uploads/sites/10/2020/06/Culture-Book_06.22.20.pdf', 'Application Process', 'Competitive salary is commensurate with the individual’s experience and skills. All full-time employees receive a comprehensive benefits package.', 'Bachelor’s in Psychology, Education, Statistics, Economics or a related social sciences field, Master’s preferred', 'Manage open science initiatives', 'Proficiency in at least one programming language a plus (Python, Matlab, Stata, C#, and/or R)', 'We are looking for an individual who has hands-on experience with research, data collection and data management. To thrive within our small and dynamic team, the individual must be capable of juggling multiple projects at once, embracing time management, and spotting areas to improve process inefficiencies.', 'Managing external vendor relationships, including an external data processing organization', 'Liaising between researchers and school district data teamsManaging external vendor relationships, including an external data processing organizationCreating operational procedures for data managementFacilitating the work of top tier scientistsEnsuring quality communication and strong relationships with researchersCoordinating data collections with schools/districtsManaging IRB protocols and grant proposalsManage open science initiativesPreparing and managing communications regarding research projectsIdentifying opportunities for increased efficiencyMaintaining attention to detail and accuracy in all tasks', 'Operations & Hiring During Coronavirus', 'Coordinating data collections with schools/districts', 'Character Lab is an equal opportunity employer and encourages a diverse pool of candidates to apply. We accept applications on a rolling basis. Please submit a compelling cover letter with your resume.', 'Key Responsibilities', 'Preparing and managing communications regarding research projects', 'Excellent project and time management skills', 'Significant experience in social science research, with a strong passion for education; prior experience working in education a plus but not required', 'Highly effective interpersonal communication, collaboration, and writing skills', 'Character Lab is looking for a Research Partnerships Manager. Reporting to the Director of Research Partnerships, they will support Character Lab Research Network’s (CLRN) data management and liaise with both external and internal partners to develop efficient systems for collecting and disseminating research data. They will also prepare and manage communications regarding research projects on the network, ensure project timelines are met, manage Character Lab’s open science initiatives such as coordinating preregistration, and manage Character Lab’s internal research. The Research Partnerships Manager will ensure that data management is running smoothly for our partner school districts and research collaborators. This person will come into a role where they can combine their passion for research and education with their skills in project management and communication.']

Strong expertise in Hadoop, HDFS, MapReduce, Hive, Spark-core, Spark-SQL, Spark-Streaming, Kafka, BigQuery, Bigtable, etcKnowledge of Hadoop architecture and various components such as HDFS, Job Tracker, Task Tracker, Name Node, Data Node and Map Reduce programming paradigm.Experienced in handling different file formats like Text file, Avro data files, Sequence files, Xml and Json files.Need to be expert in Core data structure as well as algorithm and has ability to implement them using Java /Python programming languages.Must have experience in production support and ready to do PE role.Functional knowledge in Retail Campaign Management would be ideal for this role.Experience in working with teams spread across the globe', 'Description:', 'Experienced in handling different file formats like Text file, Avro data files, Sequence files, Xml and Json files.', 'Job Type: Long Contract/ Full time', 'Experience in working with teams spread across the globe', 'Job Locations: Milpitas, CA', 'Need to be expert in Core data structure as well as algorithm and has ability to implement them using Java /Python programming languages.', 'Knowledge of Hadoop architecture and various components such as HDFS, Job Tracker, Task Tracker, Name Node, Data Node and Map Reduce programming paradigm.', 'Strong expertise in Hadoop, HDFS, MapReduce, Hive, Spark-core, Spark-SQL, Spark-Streaming, Kafka, BigQuery, Bigtable, etc', 'Functional knowledge in Retail Campaign Management would be ideal for this role.', '\xa0', 'Must have experience in production support and ready to do PE role.', 'About GSPANN', 'Or connect on social media platforms: LinkedIn, Twitter and Facebook.', 'To know more about GSPANN, visit our website www.gspann.com', '8+ years of experience in Hadoop ecosystem using GCP. ', 'Job Title: Lead Big Data Engineer in PE environment', 'We work in an exploding market of retail and e-commerce. We have served as a trusted business partner for some of the world’s most respected brands. We’ve worked with more than 200 organizations and have served as a trusted business partner for some of the world’s most respected brands. Our solutions have the businesses create custom-designed technology platforms, which have transformed the way our clients connect with their employees, partners, and customers. GSPANN is headquartered in Milpitas, CA with satellite offices around the world.']

or similar quantitative fields.Publications in top conferences.Experience writing complex SQL queries.You have deep experience with these things: logistic regression, gradient descent, regularization, cross-validation, overfitting, bias, variance, convex optimization, eigenvectors, relational databases, SQL, latency, computational complexity, sparse matrices.', 'MS in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Statistics, Physics, or similar quantitative field.Strong theoretical foundations in linear algebra, probability theory, optimization.Strong programming skills in Python.4+ years of hands-on experience in working with NumPy, scipy, scikit-learn, pandas.4+ years of industry experience shipping production machine learning models.Experience communicating projects to both technical and non-technical audiences.You know what these things are (in no particular order): logistic regression, gradient descent, regularization, cross-validation, overfitting, bias, variance, convex optimization, eigenvectors, relational databases, SQL, latency, computational complexity, sparse matrices.', 'Publications in top conferences.', 'MS in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Statistics, Physics, or similar quantitative field.', 'Writing production-quality code.', 'What it’s like to work here:\xa0', 'You’re a deeply curious person.', 'Solving problems from ideation to production, using machine learning.Experimenting, training, tuning, and shipping machine learning models.Writing production-quality code.Exploratory data analyses and investigations.Working with product managers to translate product/business problems into tractable machine learning problems.Working with machine learning infrastructure engineers to ship models.Presenting findings, results, and performance metrics to the team.', 'You’re comfortable with investigating open-ended problems and coming up with concrete approaches to solving them.', 'Preferred Qualifications:', 'Ph.D. in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Statistics, Physics, or similar quantitative fields.', 'Basic Qualifications:\xa0\xa0', 'Working with product managers to translate product/business problems into tractable machine learning problems.', '4+ years of hands-on experience in working with NumPy, scipy, scikit-learn, pandas.', 'Experimenting, training, tuning, and shipping machine learning models.', 'You may be a fit for this role if you:\xa0', 'You’re comfortable with investigating open-ended problems and coming up with concrete approaches to solving them.You know when to use machine learning and when not to!You’re a deeply curious person.You can wrangle data like a pro alligator wrestler and come out relatively unscathed.You often think about applications of machine learning in your personal life.', 'Solving problems from ideation to production, using machine learning.', 'Strong programming skills in Python.', 'You often think about applications of machine learning in your personal life.', 'Responsibilities:\xa0\xa0', 'You have deep experience with these things: logistic regression, gradient descent, regularization, cross-validation, overfitting, bias, variance, convex optimization, eigenvectors, relational databases, SQL, latency, computational complexity, sparse matrices.', 'Today, nearly every business in the world\xa0has to\xa0do bookkeeping and accounting in order to file taxes, understand financial health, and most importantly, make strategic business decisions. The process is universally manual, tedious, and error-prone. At the same time, the process follows well-defined rules, abides by industry standardization, and has become increasingly\xa0data-rich. It’s a product-focused machine learning team’s dream. Sage Intacct Artificial Intelligence Labs “SAIL” is a nimble team within Sage Intacct building the future of cloud accounting by leveraging artificial intelligence. The SAIL team builds capabilities to help businesses make better decisions through data-powered insights. We are looking for a Principal Machine Learning Scientist in San Francisco to help us ship AI-powered products\xa0and services. As a part of our cross-functional team, including data scientists and engineers, you will help steer the direction of the entire company’s Artificial Intelligence / Machine Learning effort and you will also be a key individual contributor.\xa0', 'You know when to use machine learning and when not to!', 'Exploratory data analyses and investigations.', '4+ years of industry experience shipping production machine learning models.', 'You can wrangle data like a pro alligator wrestler and come out relatively unscathed.', 'Presenting findings, results, and performance metrics to the team.', 'Strong theoretical foundations in linear algebra, probability theory, optimization.', 'You know what these things are (in no particular order): logistic regression, gradient descent, regularization, cross-validation, overfitting, bias, variance, convex optimization, eigenvectors, relational databases, SQL, latency, computational complexity, sparse matrices.', 'You will have an opportunity to work on a small and growing team based in San Francisco in an environment where engineering is central to what we do. The products we build are breaking new ground, and we have a focus on providing the best environment to allow you to do what you do best - solve problems, collaborate with your team and push first-class software. We promote an open diverse environment, encourage contributions to open-source software, and invest heavily in our staff. Our team is talented, capable, and inclusive. We know that great things can only be done with great teams and look forward to building and working with great people.', 'Working with machine learning infrastructure engineers to ship models.']

job_title: Senior Scientist, Biochemical and Cellular Pharmacology
job_text: ['Ensures timely delivery of incisive and actionable biochemical and cellular data that defines/refines drug discovery strategy', 'Turning Point Therapeutics is committed to equal opportunity in the terms and conditions of employment for all employees and job applicants without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, age, gender identity or gender expression, national origin, disability or veteran status. Turning Point Therapeutics also complies with all applicable national, state, and local laws governing nondiscrimination in employment as well as work authorization and employment eligibility verification requirements of the Immigration and Nationality Act and IRCA. Turning Point Therapeutics is an E-Verify employer.\xa0', 'Furthers Turning Point Therapeutics’ culture of scientific excellence and achievement as well as champions the career growth of a talented team of cancer biologists.', 'Communicates science and strategy effectively in a variety of internal and external settings', 'Degree in biology or biochemistry (B.S., MS, Ph.D.) or related discipline with 10+ years of\xa0in vitro\xa0pharmacology and drug discovery experience.', 'EEO & Employment Eligibility', 'We are hiring a Senior Scientist, Biochemical and Cellular Pharmacology. The Senior Scientist in the Cancer Biology & Translational Research Department will actively participate in the execution of strategies that support Turning Point Therapeutics’ drug discovery programs.\xa0', 'Experience in oncology small molecule drug discovery including creating decision-making data for project teams.', 'Skilled in quantitative analysis of enzyme kinetics and ligand binding data, including CETSA, FACS analysis, and design/implementation of IP experiments.', 'DESIRED SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE:', 'A key contributor to the Turning Point Therapeutics research organization that delivers a robust preclinical pipeline of high-value, novel oncology small molecule inhibitors spanning from Target ID to IND submission.', 'High content phenotypic screens to triage drug candidates', 'Experience with cell culture, functional cell assays, and pharmacodynamic cellular assays (ELISA, western blot immunoblot, WES).', 'Extensive assay development experience.', 'in vitro', '\xa0', 'Strong communication skills (oral and written).', 'Turning Point Therapeutics is a clinical-stage precision oncology company with a pipeline of internally discovered investigational drugs designed to address key limitations of existing cancer therapies. The company’s lead program, repotrectinib, is a next-generation kinase inhibitor targeting genetic drivers of non-small cell lung cancer and advanced solid tumors. Turning Point Therapeutics is driven to develop therapies that mark a turning point for patients in their cancer treatment.', 'A key contributor to the Turning Point Therapeutics research organization that delivers a robust preclinical pipeline of high-value, novel oncology small molecule inhibitors spanning from Target ID to IND submission.Devises and executes both biochemical and cellular studies that drive the drug discovery decisions to enable project teams to move from target validation through clinical candidate selectionEnsures timely delivery of incisive and actionable biochemical and cellular data that defines/refines drug discovery strategyCommunicates science and strategy effectively in a variety of internal and external settingsFurthers Turning Point Therapeutics’ culture of scientific excellence and achievement as well as champions the career growth of a talented team of cancer biologists.', 'Good command of biochemistry and cellular signaling.', 'A desire to be part of a highly innovative company aimed at transforming the lives of people with serious diseases, their families and society', 'Degree in biology or biochemistry (B.S., MS, Ph.D.) or related discipline with 10+ years of\xa0in vitro\xa0pharmacology and drug discovery experience.Broad and deep experience in developing and optimizing biochemical assays (coupled enzymatic, HTRF, TR-FRET, SOX fluorescence, mobility-shift, and fluorescence polarization) of small molecule inhibitors or agonists.Skilled in quantitative analysis of enzyme kinetics and ligand binding data, including CETSA, FACS analysis, and design/implementation of IP experiments.High content phenotypic screens to triage drug candidatesExperience with cell culture, functional cell assays, and pharmacodynamic cellular assays (ELISA, western blot immunoblot, WES).Experience in oncology small molecule drug discovery including creating decision-making data for project teams.Extensive assay development experience.Good command of biochemistry and cellular signaling.Strong communication skills (oral and written).A desire to be part of a highly innovative company aimed at transforming the lives of people with serious diseases, their families and society', 'Devises and executes both biochemical and cellular studies that drive the drug discovery decisions to enable project teams to move from target validation through clinical candidate selection', '\xa0DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES:\xa0\xa0', 'Broad and deep experience in developing and optimizing biochemical assays (coupled enzymatic, HTRF, TR-FRET, SOX fluorescence, mobility-shift, and fluorescence polarization) of small molecule inhibitors or agonists.', 'The ideal candidate should have a deep knowledge of both biochemical and cellular analysis of small molecule inhibitors as well as small molecule drug discovery. The successful candidate will develop disease-relevant assays (biochemical and cellular), drive structure-activity analysis by creating decision-making data, and perform mechanism of drug action studies\xa0in vitro. The candidate should be able to distill relevant findings from the scientific literature to adapt experimental approaches for internal efforts. This scientist will be comfortable working in a team environment and is expected to have strong written and oral communication skills. We are looking for a highly motivated and skilled leader with a strong background in oncology and drug discovery to join our team.']

['', 'Strong evidence of conceptual thinking, active follow-through and vigorous scientific curiosity.', 'Proven ability to work well with others in a dynamic and highly collaborative environment.', 'Company Overview\xa0', 'Description', 'Oversee laboratory experimentation to define and optimize new chemical routes to active pharmaceutical ingredients and intermediates, and scalable, cost effective processes.', 'Demonstrated excellence in organic synthesis, conversant with the current literature.', 'Drive medicinal chemistry progress within a small molecule discovery project at Fulcrum.', 'Ability to champion chemistry efforts into new directions to achieve project milestones.', 'Structure-based drug design experience preferred.', 'At least 5-10 years of industry experience strongly preferred.', 'Drive medicinal chemistry progress within a small molecule discovery project at Fulcrum.Lead the execution of design, synthesis, purification and characterization of bioactive compounds.Own the design of new bioactive compounds by interacting with other chemists and biologists to optimize DMPK, in vitro, and in vivo pharmacology properties.Oversee laboratory experimentation to define and optimize new chemical routes to active pharmaceutical ingredients and intermediates, and scalable, cost effective processes.Lead and oversee effective interactions with external CROs.Develop timelines to meet project goals.', 'Own the design of new bioactive compounds by interacting with other chemists and biologists to optimize DMPK, in vitro, and in vivo pharmacology properties.', 'Fulcrum Therapeutics is a clinical-stage biopharmaceutical company focused on improving the lives of patients with genetically defined diseases in areas of high unmet medical need. Fulcrum’s proprietary patient-focused product engine is designed to systematically identify and validate cellular drug targets that can modulate gene expression to treat the root cause of genetically defined rare diseases.\xa0The Company has advanced losmapimod to Phase 2 clinical development for the treatment of facioscapulohumeral muscular dystrophy (FSHD) and is advancing losmapimod to Phase 3 for the treatment of COVID-19. Fulcrum also anticipates a regulatory filing in the second half of 2020 with FTX-6058 for the treatment of sickle cell disease.', 'Exceptional interpersonal, verbal and written communication skills.', 'PHD. in synthetic organic chemistry or equivalent.Structure-based drug design experience preferred.At least 5-10 years of industry experience strongly preferred.High level of creativity and productivity with strong medicinal chemistry problem solving skills.Chemical biology experience is preferred.Demonstrated excellence in organic synthesis, conversant with the current literature.Ability to champion chemistry efforts into new directions to achieve project milestones.Strong evidence of conceptual thinking, active follow-through and vigorous scientific curiosity.Proven ability to work well with others in a dynamic and highly collaborative environment.Exceptional interpersonal, verbal and written communication skills.', 'Develop timelines to meet project goals.', 'We are seeking a highly motivated individual to be responsible for the design, synthesis, and characterization of small-molecule drug candidates in target validation, hit-to-lead and lead optimization projects. In this role, the successful candidate will engage in synthetic and medicinal chemistry problem solving and work with team members to drive project progress, including leading interactions with external CROs. He/She will collaborate across disciplines to analyze diverse data sets to build structure-activity relationships and drive programs.\xa0As a Principal Scientist, the candidate will have collaborative engagement with the external scientific community and make direct contributions to Fulcrum’s external reputation.', 'PHD. in synthetic organic chemistry or equivalent.', 'Chemical biology experience is preferred.', 'Lead the execution of design, synthesis, purification and characterization of bioactive compounds.', 'High level of creativity and productivity with strong medicinal chemistry problem solving skills.', 'Qualifications', 'Lead and oversee effective interactions with external CROs.', 'Responsibilities']

['', 'Some Challenges You’ll Tackle:', 'Interest in coding best practices, both in acquiring them, developing them, and evangelizing them to teammates and others.', 'Why Work For Us', 'Strong ability to distill and communicate complex technical concepts and solutions at a level appropriate for the intended audience.', 'MealPerks.\xa0Who’s ready for some lunch? We provide our employees with a weekly Grubhub credit\xa0to enjoy and support local restaurants. We also offer company-wide meals several times a year to bring our Grubhub family together.', 'Flexible PTO.\xa0Grubhub employees are provided a generous amount of time to recharge their batteries.\xa0', 'And Of Course, Perks!', 'Build and deploy models and algorithms that intelligently automate a diverse array of services and operations that make Grubhub food delivery possible.', 'Learning and Career Growth.\xa0', 'Grubhub is an equal opportunity employer. We evaluate qualified applicants without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, veteran status, and other legally protected characteristics. The EEO is the Law poster is available here:\xa0DOL Poster. If you are applying for a job in the U.S. and need a reasonable accommodation for any part of the employment process, please send an e-mail to TalentAcquisition@grubhub.com and let us know the nature of your request and contact information. Please note that only those inquiries concerning a request for reasonable accommodation will be responded to from this email address.\xa0\xa0', 'Got These?\xa0Even Better:', 'Master’s degree in a quantitative or technical field such as Statistics, Mathematics, Physics, Computer Science or Computer Engineering', 'Ph.D. in aforementioned quantitative or technical field or 6 years of industry directly relevant industry experience.Past successes processing, analyzing, and modeling GPS data or geotraces.Experience with big data: extraction, processing, filtering, and presenting large data quantities using cloud technologies like AWS.Familiarity with utilizing a clustered distributed-data processing tool such as Spark, Dask or Hive.Expert level knowledge of experimental statistics, analysis and best practices.', 'Expert level knowledge of experimental statistics, analysis and best practices.', 'Fun.\xa0', 'Experience with the entire pipeline of deploying machine-learning algorithms including their development, validation, implementation, and production launch.', '4 years of industry experience in a data science role or adjacent position', 'CA Privacy Notice: If you are a resident of the State of California and would like a copy of our CA privacy notice, please email privacy@grubhub.com.\xa0', 'Grubhub is looking for an innately curious, business-minded, results-oriented Data Scientist to work on our Logistics Data Science team. As part of our Delivery initiative, this team is focused on developing models, algorithms, simulations, and experiments to accelerate and perfect our delivery systems. As a member of this highly collaborative team, you will get to partner with stakeholders all across the business to solve diverse, novel and highly challenging problems.\xa0The team’s responsibilities are uniquely broad; they encompass topics such as delivery timing estimation, driver payment strategies, dynamic market balancing and smarter driver dispatching.', 'Experience with big data: extraction, processing, filtering, and presenting large data quantities using cloud technologies like AWS.', 'You will constantly pivot between the daily tasks of analysis, model building and programming to architecting a strategic vision for how our team can automate and optimize Grubhub’s delivery operations.', 'Flexible PTO.', 'Health and Wellness.', 'Expert knowledge with Python scripting language and SQL.', 'Flexible PTO.\xa0Grubhub employees are provided a generous amount of time to recharge their batteries.\xa0Health and Wellness.\xa0We provide programs that support your overall well-being such as generous medical benefits, employee network groups, company-wide fitness challenges, and a comfortable and casual workplace! We also support our parents by offering 8 weeks of paid parent bonding time, a 4-week returnship program, and 6-8 weeks paid medical leave.Learning and Career Growth.\xa0Your personal and professional development is a priority at Grubhub. From day one, we empower you to lead and be an active participant in your career growth.\xa0We provide continuous learning opportunities, training, and coaching and mentorship programs.\xa0\xa0MealPerks.\xa0Who’s ready for some lunch? We provide our employees with a weekly Grubhub credit\xa0to enjoy and support local restaurants. We also offer company-wide meals several times a year to bring our Grubhub family together.Fun.\xa0Every Grubhub office has an employee-led Culture Crew that connects people through fun, meaningful events and initiatives. Some of our popular past events include: Wing-eating contests, Grubtoberfest, 5k Runs, Bring Your Child to Work Day, regular happy hours, and more!Social Impact.\xa0We believe in the importance of serving the communities that support our business. In addition, employees are given paid time off each year to support the causes that are important to them.\xa0', 'Master’s degree in a quantitative or technical field such as Statistics, Mathematics, Physics, Computer Science or Computer Engineering4 years of industry experience in a data science role or adjacent positionExpert knowledge with Python scripting language and SQL.Experience with the entire pipeline of deploying machine-learning algorithms including their development, validation, implementation, and production launch.Demonstrable proficiency in basic statistics, linear algebra, and calculus as they relate to machine learning concepts.Interest in coding best practices, both in acquiring them, developing them, and evangelizing them to teammates and others.Strong ability to distill and communicate complex technical concepts and solutions at a level appropriate for the intended audience.', 'Apply robust and maintainable coding practices to ensure high-quality outputs at all times to our model consumers.', 'Demonstrable proficiency in basic statistics, linear algebra, and calculus as they relate to machine learning concepts.', 'Health and Wellness.\xa0We provide programs that support your overall well-being such as generous medical benefits, employee network groups, company-wide fitness challenges, and a comfortable and casual workplace! We also support our parents by offering 8 weeks of paid parent bonding time, a 4-week returnship program, and 6-8 weeks paid medical leave.', 'Past successes processing, analyzing, and modeling GPS data or geotraces.', 'Grubhub is dedicated to connecting hungry diners with our wide network of restaurants across the country. Our innovative technology, easy-to-use platforms and streamlined delivery capabilities make us\xa0an industry leader today, and in the future of online food ordering.\xa0', '\xa0', 'About The Opportunity', 'Social Impact.\xa0', 'We strive to create a workplace that reflects the diversity of our customers and the communities we serve. When you join our team, you become part of a community that works together to innovate, solve problems, take risks, grow, work hard and have a ton of fun in the process!', 'You Should Have:', 'Learning and Career Growth.\xa0Your personal and professional development is a priority at Grubhub. From day one, we empower you to lead and be an active participant in your career growth.\xa0We provide continuous learning opportunities, training, and coaching and mentorship programs.\xa0\xa0', 'Build and deploy models and algorithms that intelligently automate a diverse array of services and operations that make Grubhub food delivery possible.You will constantly pivot between the daily tasks of analysis, model building and programming to architecting a strategic vision for how our team can automate and optimize Grubhub’s delivery operations.You will develop and maintain strong relationships with software engineering teams consuming your algorithm and model outputs.Apply robust and maintainable coding practices to ensure high-quality outputs at all times to our model consumers.', 'Social Impact.\xa0We believe in the importance of serving the communities that support our business. In addition, employees are given paid time off each year to support the causes that are important to them.\xa0', 'We have a fast-paced environment and that is what our teams thrive on.\xa0Grubhub\xa0believes in empowering people and offering opportunities for development, as well as professional growth.\xa0\xa0We value strong, positive relationships in all areas: with each other, our customers and our greater community.\xa0Want to be a part of a team of diverse collaborators in an authentically fun culture?\xa0If so, we want to talk to you - and hear what’s your favorite restaurant for food delivery!', 'MealPerks.', 'You will develop and maintain strong relationships with software engineering teams consuming your algorithm and model outputs.', 'Familiarity with utilizing a clustered distributed-data processing tool such as Spark, Dask or Hive.', 'A successful candidate is a motivated individual with strong model, algorithm, and software development, and communication skills.\xa0They should hold themselves to a high standard for coding best practices and a passion for pushing their team to new heights by designing new tools and evangelizing durable and efficient solutions for deploying large scale machine learning models and algorithms.\xa0Ideally, the candidate would strive to remain abreast with related science technologies, show leadership in charting new avenues for automation through data science and the rare ability to appropriately balance short term gains with long term goals.', 'Fun.\xa0Every Grubhub office has an employee-led Culture Crew that connects people through fun, meaningful events and initiatives. Some of our popular past events include: Wing-eating contests, Grubtoberfest, 5k Runs, Bring Your Child to Work Day, regular happy hours, and more!', 'Ph.D. in aforementioned quantitative or technical field or 6 years of industry directly relevant industry experience.']

['MSc degree in rigorous quantitative science (such as mathematics, computer science, engineering)Extensive hands-on experience applying data science tools in practice.Practical software development skills in standard data science tools (such as R or python)Extensive knowledge of mathematical modelling and statistical modelling techniques, and drive to continue to learn and develop these skills.Communication, business analysis, and consultancy.Minimum 5+ years of work experience', 'Practical software development skills in standard data science tools (such as R or python)', 'Collaborate in a multidisciplinary environment with world leading clinicians, data scientists, biological experts, statisticians and IT professionals.', 'Leads small (2-3 person) data science projects of defined scope.', 'Extensive knowledge of mathematical modelling and statistical modelling techniques, and drive to continue to learn and develop these skills.', 'Education, Qualifications, Skills and Experience', 'Provides advanced quantitative expertise to AstraZeneca projects and researches and recommends appropriate data science solutions, appropriately communicating with a range of stakeholders.', 'PhD degree in rigorous quantitative science (such as mathematics, computer science, engineering).', 'In-depth experience of working in a global organization with complex/geographical context', 'Works within established frameworks to deliver a variety of tasks that support projects in meeting their objectives.', 'Coaches/mentors junior data scientists and others to drive the development of data science as an AZ capability.', 'As a Principal Data Scientist you will play a key role on the front line in this rapidly growing team working to extract insight from complex biomedical data. You will apply and develop your leadership skills and your expertise in rigorous quantitative data science to provide solutions to a variety of data science problems, researching, recommending and delivering novel methodologies to solve the problems that matter to the oncology pipeline.', "Examples of projects the team works on include machine learning models for developing digital biomarkers, patient risk stratification for clinical trials, new algorithms for survival analysis, approaches to quantitatively analyse wearable data, linking of medical imaging data with 'omics and longitudinal outcomes to identify and/or validate new drug targets, and much more!", 'Essential', 'Communication, business analysis, and consultancy.', 'Job Description / Capsule', 'Experience within the pharmaceutical industry.', 'Principal Data Scientist', 'Reviews working practices and ensures non-compliant processes are escalated.', 'Develops novel data science solutions where off-the-shelf methodologies do not fit.', ' ', 'Independently keeps own knowledge up to date and learns from senior team members, proposing appropriate training courses for personal development.', 'PhD degree in rigorous quantitative science (such as mathematics, computer science, engineering).Experience within the pharmaceutical industry.In-depth experience of working in a global organization with complex/geographical context', 'Oncology Data Science & Analytics', "The Machine Learning and AI team in AstraZeneca's Oncology Data Science & Analytics group is where we develop and apply sophisticated algorithms and techniques to solve the hardest problems in oncology drug discovery and development. The team uses their scientific, quantitative, and problem-solving skills to work on a broad range of challenges across the whole oncology portfolio, working collaboratively with other scientists across a range of disciplines to scope, define, and deliver projects that both advance the state of the art in data science and accelerate the delivery of innovative medicines to patients.", 'Desirable', 'Ensures own work is compliant within Clinical Development.', 'MSc degree in rigorous quantitative science (such as mathematics, computer science, engineering)', 'Typical Accountabilities', 'Machine Learning and AI', 'Minimum 5+ years of work experience', 'Provides advanced quantitative expertise to AstraZeneca projects and researches and recommends appropriate data science solutions, appropriately communicating with a range of stakeholders.Develops novel data science solutions where off-the-shelf methodologies do not fit.Leads small (2-3 person) data science projects of defined scope.Independently keeps own knowledge up to date and learns from senior team members, proposing appropriate training courses for personal development.Coaches/mentors junior data scientists and others to drive the development of data science as an AZ capability.Works within established frameworks to deliver a variety of tasks that support projects in meeting their objectives.Reviews working practices and ensures non-compliant processes are escalated.Ensures own work is compliant within Clinical Development.Collaborate in a multidisciplinary environment with world leading clinicians, data scientists, biological experts, statisticians and IT professionals.', 'Extensive hands-on experience applying data science tools in practice.']

Students participating in the program are highly encouraged to bring a vehicle. Carpooling with other students MAY be available but NOT guaranteed. - Subsidized housing accommodations are available upon request if school is located in excess of 75 miles from NSA main HQs campus.', ' Must be a U.S. citizen. - Must be eligible to be granted a security clearance. - Must have a minimum cumulative GPA of 3.0 on a 4.0 scale. - Must be currently enrolled in a degree-seeking college or university program; must have completed the junior year of undergraduate career prior to the internship, and have at least one semester remaining following the internship. - Undergraduate and Graduate students are eligible. - Must provide unofficial or official transcripts. - Must major in Human Resources, Business, Marketing, or Psychology with a documented Human Resources minor. - Must be available for an operational interview and other applicable processing between the months of December 2020 and March 2021. Additional Qualifications: Candidates are expected to have completed courses in at least one of the following areas of study: - Compensation and Benefits. - Data Science. - Economics. - Employee and Labor Relations. - Employment Law. - Statistics. - Organizational Behavior. - Organizational Research. - HR Analysis. - HR Strategy. - Global HR. - Workforce Planning and Staffing. - Performance Management. Skills and Abilities We are seeking candidates who can demonstrate a variety of skills and abilities including: - Customer Service to anticipate and identify the needs of customers. - Consulting Skills to build effective relationships with line managers to help them strategically manage their human resources. - Written and Verbal Communication Skills to articulate HR strategies, initiatives, options and advice. - Ability to interpret and apply legislation and policies related to HR. - Work Management and Organizational Skills to manage multiple activities to accomplish desired end results.', 'Qualifications', 'Job Summary', 'How To Apply - External', 'DCIPS Disclaimer', 'Pay, Benefits, & Work Schedule', 'Responsibilities']

', 'Your talent, our opportunities - This is the premise behind US Tech Solutions.', ' • Work with human biological specimens. HepB Vaccination advised.', ' • Ability to handle human specimens with appropriate precautions', ' • Experience working in a Biological Safety Cabinet required.', ' Key Requirements:', 'USTECH was founded in 2000 by Manoj Agarwal. Today, we are a global firm offering talent solutions to 150 customers including 20% of Fortune 500 across Financial Services, Healthcare, Life Sciences, Aerospace, Energy, Retail, Telecom, Technology, Manufacturing, and Engineering. We are headquartered in New Jersey with 40 global locations across the USA, Canada, Europe, and India. Deloitte has recognized USTECH as one of the fastest growing private businesses for the past five consecutive years and INC 500 for the past three. We have also been rated “The Top Business in the US" by Diversity Business since 2011. To learn more about how US Tech Solutions visit our website: www.ustechsolutions.com.', 'You have the skill we have the opportunity. As a team, we work passionately for you to get the right career opportunity across industry verticals and functions. For past sixteen years, leading Global', 'US Tech Solutions is seeking a\xa0“Research Associate”\xa0for a\xa006+ months contract\xa0with a client in\xa0Gaithersburg, MD and South San Francisco, CA', ' • Attention to detail to ensure chain of custody of all samples.', 'Job Description\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0', ' Job Details:', ' • Ability to follow laboratory specified documentation practices', 'Apply: Interested candidates are requested to send their resume to Jasmin at Jasmin@ustechsolutionsinc.com', ' Our laboratories are developing a high-throughput serologic ELISA method to detect SARS-CoV-2 antibodies in human plasma. The method will be used to assess Key Workers for the presence of antibodies to SARS-CoV-2.', ' • Experience working with lab automation (e.g. Agilent Bravo; Integra ViaFlo, AssistPlus) preferred.', ' • Work in BSL2 laboratory with experience in ELISA or equivalent immunoassays required.', ' The successful candidate should be experienced as a lab technician performing ELISAs, and able to generate reproducible results under the guidance of a senior scientist or lab manager. Good hands, organizational skills, and a keen eye for detail are essential.', ' • Work with samples which may contain SARS-CoV-2.', 'About US Tech Solutions: ', 'Job Details:', ' • Ability to follow CAPA (Corrective and Preventive Action) procedures', " • Scientific Bachelor's degree preferred.\xa0", ' ', 'Connect with our talent team today.', ' We are seeking a highly motivated Research Associate who will support the initial assay optimization and validation activities. Following implementation of the method, the majority of lab work will involve the testing of samples in a semi-automated workflow in 384 well format per standard operating procedures. Test samples may contain SARS-CoV-2 so adherence to lab safety procedures is critical. The Research Associate is also expected to review the data when it is available, and to alert laboratory management of any data or techinal issues.', '\xa0', 'Companies and Fortune 500 come to us to get the right talent. Whether you want to work as full-time, contractor or part-time, technical or non-technical our talent consultants will connect with the right career opportunity globally.', 'Job Description\xa0', ' • Ability to rigorously follow SOPs.', 'Key Requirements:', ' • Experience working in a GLP and/or CLIA environment preferred.', ' • Working and communicating across a fast-paced cross organizational team.']

job_title: Senior Data Scientist - ECG and intracardiac EGM signals
job_text: ['', 'Degree in Biomedical, Electrical Engineering Computer engineering, Computer Science or related field with an emphasis on biomedical signal processing and machine learning. M.S. or PhD strongly preferredPostdoctoral experience a plus', 'Location: Los Angeles, CA', 'Develop digital filtering routines to enhance cardiac signals and remove noise and artifact generated from various sources of interference', 'Duration: Permanent', 'Stay up to date on the latest research in Cardiac Mapping and Bioelectronic Medicine', 'Biomedical signal analysis, e.g. EGM, ECG, EMG, EEG, ENGAdvanced biomedical signal processing skillsExperience with machine learning, AI and big data analysisOutstanding MatLab proficiencyKnowledge of physiologyExcellent written and verbal communication skillsGood presentation skills', 'Knowledge of physiology', 'Responsibilities include:', 'Biomedical signal analysis, e.g. EGM, ECG, EMG, EEG, ENG', 'Collaborate with Software Engineers in defining product design specifications', 'Experience with machine learning, AI and big data analysis', 'Advanced biomedical signal processing skills', 'Applies knowledge of biomedical signal processing to surface ECG, intracardiac and ENG/EMG signals to develop algorithms for product integration', 'Collaborate with Electrophysiologists, researchers, scientists, cathlab staff to identify workflow problems and solutions', 'Role: Senior Data Scientist - ECG and intracardiac EGM signals', 'Conduct applied research on supervised and unsupervised learning algorithms to develop new approaches to analyzing ECG and EGM signals both in real-time and retrospectively', 'Keep abreast of the latest research and techniques to identifying cardiac arrythmias\xa0', 'Excellent written and verbal communication skills', 'Necessary Skills:', 'Good presentation skills', 'Manage research timelines and work with PMO and Marketing to prioritize key feature development', "The Senior\xa0Data Scientist will be responsible for the analysis of surface ECG and intracardiac EGM signals to develop new algorithm modules for the company's\xa0novel real-time signal processing platform. Additionally, incumbent will develop advanced signal processing algorithms for Bioelectronic Medicine products to classify nerve activity. He/she will work closely with software engineering, scientific, clinical and marketing departments on the integration of modules and support VOC activities. The Sr. Data Scientist will lead the effort in organizing and characterizing large datasets applying machine learning and AI approaches, and work with external groups on the delivery of new product innovation. New algorithm modules are to enhance the efficiency, safety and efficacy of cardiac ablation procedures and improve patient outcomes reducing the need for further procedures.", 'Degree in Biomedical, Electrical Engineering Computer engineering, Computer Science or related field with an emphasis on biomedical signal processing and machine learning. ['', ' Experience manipulating and transforming large datasets – either on large scale RDBMS or SQL-on-Hadoop technologies such as Hive, Pig, Impala, Spark SQL, and/or Presto. Experience with machine learning or statistical libraries: SparkML, scikitlearn, caret, mlr, MLlib Strong troubleshooting and problem-solving skills Effective communication and strong collaboration skills Commercial security solutions such as web application firewalls, IDS/IPS, SIEM, DLP, DDOS mitigation Experience automating IT & security tasks Implementation experience with enterprise security solutions such as WAF, IPS, Anti-DDOS, and SIEM Understanding architectural implications of meeting industry standards such as PCI DSS, ISO 27001, HIPAA, and NIST/DoD frameworks', 'Description', ' Solutions – You like working with customers to solve problems and identify opportunities in their security approach and implementation. You’ll define and deliver on-site technical engagements with partners and customers. This includes not only delivering custom solution engagements, but also participating in pre-sales on-site visits, understanding customer security and compliance requirements, evaluating their data and analytics readiness, and proposing and delivering packaged offerings.', 'Company', ' Strong troubleshooting and problem-solving skills', ' Delivery - Lead the hands-on execution of customer engagements and internal builder projects. Customer engagements include migration of existing functionality, evolution of existing capabilities and process, and development of new applications using AWS cloud services.', ' Commercial security solutions such as web application firewalls, IDS/IPS, SIEM, DLP, DDOS mitigation', ' Experience manipulating and transforming large datasets – either on large scale RDBMS or SQL-on-Hadoop technologies such as Hive, Pig, Impala, Spark SQL, and/or Presto.', ' Experience automating IT & security tasks', ' OR: Phd/MTech/MS in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence/Machine Learning, Mathematics or Statistics and 3+ years’ experience in data science and predictive modeling', ' Effective communication and strong collaboration skills', 'Responsibilities Include', ' Expertise – Customers using AWS are collecting more data than ever before about their network, infrastructure, services, applications, and users. There is a broad canvas of security-related data waiting to be tapped to help our customers know their information resources and keep them safe. You’re an expert with data – envisioning scenarios, cleaning data, gaining initial insight, building models, iterating, and bringing action from insight.', ' EITHER: Bachelor’s Degree in a highly quantitative field (Computer Science, Machine Learning, Operational Research, Statistics, Mathematics) and 5+ years’ experience in data science and predictive modeling OR: Phd/MTech/MS in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence/Machine Learning, Mathematics or Statistics and 3+ years’ experience in data science and predictive modeling Experience using Python and/or R Previous experience in a ML or data scientist role and a track record of building ML or DL models', ' Understanding architectural implications of meeting industry standards such as PCI DSS, ISO 27001, HIPAA, and NIST/DoD frameworks', ' Practice Development – Helping customers is our number one goal – but it’s not our only goal. With each engagement, you’re looking for ways to collect, capture, package and share your knowledge with new customers, partners, and AWS employees. You are a force-multiplier – developing tools, services, and new artifacts to help others build on the work you deliver.', ' EITHER: Bachelor’s Degree in a highly quantitative field (Computer Science, Machine Learning, Operational Research, Statistics, Mathematics) and 5+ years’ experience in data science and predictive modeling', 'Preferred Qualifications', ' This is a customer facing role. You will be required to travel to client locations and deliver professional services when needed.', ' Expertise – Customers using AWS are collecting more data than ever before about their network, infrastructure, services, applications, and users. There is a broad canvas of security-related data waiting to be tapped to help our customers know their information resources and keep them safe. You’re an expert with data – envisioning scenarios, cleaning data, gaining initial insight, building models, iterating, and bringing action from insight. Solutions – You like working with customers to solve problems and identify opportunities in their security approach and implementation. You’ll define and deliver on-site technical engagements with partners and customers. This includes not only delivering custom solution engagements, but also participating in pre-sales on-site visits, understanding customer security and compliance requirements, evaluating their data and analytics readiness, and proposing and delivering packaged offerings. Delivery - Lead the hands-on execution of customer engagements and internal builder projects. Customer engagements include migration of existing functionality, evolution of existing capabilities and process, and development of new applications using AWS cloud services. Practice Development – Helping customers is our number one goal – but it’s not our only goal. With each engagement, you’re looking for ways to collect, capture, package and share your knowledge with new customers, partners, and AWS employees. You are a force-multiplier – developing tools, services, and new artifacts to help others build on the work you deliver. This is a customer facing role. You will be required to travel to client locations and deliver professional services when needed.', 'Basic Qualifications', ' Previous experience in a ML or data scientist role and a track record of building ML or DL models', ' Implementation experience with enterprise security solutions such as WAF, IPS, Anti-DDOS, and SIEM', ' Experience with machine learning or statistical libraries: SparkML, scikitlearn, caret, mlr, MLlib', ' Experience using Python and/or R']

['Experience communicating projects to both technical and non-technical audiences.', 'Experience writing complex SQL queries.', 'Publications in top conferences.', 'MS in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Statistics, Physics, or similar quantitative field.', '4+ years industry experience shipping production machine learning models.', 'Writing production-quality code.', 'What it’s like to work here:\xa0', 'You’re a deeply curious person.', 'MS in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Statistics, Physics, or similar quantitative field.Strong theoretical foundations in linear algebra, probability theory, optimization.Strong programming skills in Python.4+ years of hands-on experience in working with numpy, scipy, scikit-learn, pandas.4+ years industry experience shipping production machine learning models.Experience communicating projects to both technical and non-technical audiences.You know what these things are (in no particular order): logistic regression, gradient descent, regularization, cross-validation, overfitting, bias, variance, convex optimization, eigenvectors, relational databases, SQL, latency, computational complexity, sparse matrices.', 'You’re comfortable with investigating open-ended problems and coming up with concrete approaches to solve them.', 'Preferred Qualifications:', 'Basic Qualifications:\xa0\xa0', 'Working with product managers to translate product/business problems into tractable machine learning problems.', 'Experimenting, training, tuning, and shipping machine learning models.', 'You may be a fit for this role if you:\xa0', 'Solving problems from ideation to production, using machine learning.', 'Strong programming skills in Python.', 'You’re comfortable with investigating open-ended problems and coming up with concrete approaches to solve them.You know when to use machine learning and when not to!You’re a deeply curious person.You can wrangle data like a pro alligator wrestler and come out relatively unscathed.You often think about applications of machine learning in your personal life.', 'You often think about applications of machine learning in your personal life.', 'Responsibilities:\xa0\xa0', 'You have deep experience with these things: logistic regression, gradient descent, regularization, cross-validation, overfitting, bias, variance, convex optimization, eigenvectors, relational databases, SQL, latency, computational complexity, sparse matrices.', 'PhD in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Statistics, Physics, or similar quantitative fields.', 'You know when to use machine learning and when not to!', 'You will have an opportunity to work on a small and growing team based in San Francisco in an environment where engineering is central to what we do. The products we build are breaking new ground, and we have a focus on providing the best environment to allow you to do what you do best - solve problems, collaborate with your team and push first class software. We promote an open diverse environment, encourage contributions to open-source software and invest heavily in our staff. Our team is talented, capable and inclusive. We know that great things can only be done with great teams and look forward to building and working with great people.', 'PhD in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Statistics, Physics, or similar quantitative fields.Publications in top conferences.Experience writing complex SQL queries.You have deep experience with these things: logistic regression, gradient descent, regularization, cross-validation, overfitting, bias, variance, convex optimization, eigenvectors, relational databases, SQL, latency, computational complexity, sparse matrices.', 'Exploratory data analyses and investigations.', 'Today, nearly every business in the world\xa0has to\xa0do bookkeeping and accounting in order to file taxes, understand financial health, and most importantly, make strategic business decisions. The process is universally manual, tedious, and error prone. At the same time, the process follows well-defined rules, abides by industry standardization, and has become increasingly\xa0data-rich. It’s a product-focused machine learning team’s dream. Sage Intacct Artificial Intelligence Labs “SAIL” is a nimble team within Sage Intacct building the future of cloud accounting by leveraging artificial intelligence. The SAIL team builds capabilities to help businesses make better decisions through data-powered insights. We are looking for a Principal Machine Learning Scientist in San Francisco to help us ship AI-powered products\xa0and services. As a part of our cross-functional team, including data scientists and engineers, you will help steer the direction of the entire company’s Artificial Intelligence / Machine Learning effort and you will also be a key individual contributor.\xa0', 'You can wrangle data like a pro alligator wrestler and come out relatively unscathed.', 'You know what these things are (in no particular order): logistic regression, gradient descent, regularization, cross-validation, overfitting, bias, variance, convex optimization, eigenvectors, relational databases, SQL, latency, computational complexity, sparse matrices.', 'Strong theoretical foundations in linear algebra, probability theory, optimization.', 'Solving problems from ideation to production, using machine learning.Experimenting, training, tuning, and shipping machine learning models.Writing production-quality code.Exploratory data analyses and investigations.Working with product managers to translate product/business problems into tractable machine learning problems.Working with machine learning infrastructure engineers to ship models.Presenting findings, results, and performance metrics to team.', 'Presenting findings, results, and performance metrics to team.', '4+ years of hands-on experience in working with numpy, scipy, scikit-learn, pandas.', 'Working with machine learning infrastructure engineers to ship models.']

And unlike other marketing platforms, Klaviyo doesn’t force companies to compromise between advanced functionality or ease of use - so companies of all sizes are able to maximize their sales quickly. We’ve built a robust platform to do this through a combination of machine learning models that precisely target members, an experimentation and engagement platform built on a combination of open source technologies, and a partnership with a team of marketers and behavioral scientists dedicated to helping design winning engagement strategies. Through this platform we identify key decisions that we want to help influence, develop both the data science and engagement strategies for targeting and influencing those decisions, and optimize campaigns through A/B testing and statistical and machine learning techniques (e.g. identifying members most likely to respond).  You will lead one of the teams dedicated to NBAs and your responsibilities would include: ', 'Applies experience from strategy consulting, analytics, and data engineering to successfully direct the development of statistical and mathematical analyses to support the development of NBAs. job_text: ['', 'Background Investigation: Applicants selected will be subject to a Federal background investigation and must meet eligibility requirements for access to classified matter in accordance 10 CFR 710, Appendix B.', 'Requirements', 'Proven ability to work independently and to quickly adapt to new scientific environments', 'Ability to contribute that knowledge to the academic and research strength of PNNL and have experience writing scientific publications demonstrating their insight and discovery (e.g., publication in conferences such as NeurIPS, ICML, ICLR, KDD, CVPR, ICCV, ECCV, ACL, ICWSM, EMNLP, NAACL, EACL, COLING, and SIGIR is preferred)', 'Organization and Job ID', 'Job Description', 'Drug Testing: All Security Clearance (L or Q) positions will be considered by the Department of Energy to be Testing Designated Positions which means that they are subject to applicant, random, and for cause drug testing. In addition, applicants must be able to demonstrate non-use of illegal drugs, including marijuana, for the 12 consecutive months preceding completion of the requisite Questionnaire for National Security Positions (QNSP).', ' U.S. Citizenship Background Investigation: Applicants selected will be subject to a Federal background investigation and must meet eligibility requirements for access to classified matter in accordance 10 CFR 710, Appendix B. Drug Testing: All Security Clearance (L or Q) positions will be considered by the Department of Energy to be Testing Designated Positions which means that they are subject to applicant, random, and for cause drug testing. In addition, applicants must be able to demonstrate non-use of illegal drugs, including marijuana, for the 12 consecutive months preceding completion of the requisite Questionnaire for National Security Positions (QNSP). ', 'Minimum Qualifications', 'U.S. Citizenship', 'Preferred Qualifications', 'Other Information', 'Strong interpersonal skills and the ability to collaborate effectively on diverse teams are required.', 'Effective written and oral communication is required', 'Equal Employment Opportunity', ' Please be aware that the Department of Energy (DOE) prohibits DOE employees and contractors from participation in certain foreign government talent recruitment programs. If you are offered a position at PNNL and are currently a participant in a foreign government talent recruitment program you will be required to disclose this information before your first day of employment. ', 'Master’s Degree in a Computer Science or related area.', ' Master’s Degree in a Computer Science or related area. Effective written and oral communication is required Strong interpersonal skills and the ability to collaborate effectively on diverse teams are required. Proven ability to work independently and to quickly adapt to new scientific environments Ability to contribute that knowledge to the academic and research strength of PNNL and have experience writing scientific publications demonstrating their insight and discovery (e.g., publication in conferences such as NeurIPS, ICML, ICLR, KDD, CVPR, ICCV, ECCV, ACL, ICWSM, EMNLP, NAACL, EACL, COLING, and SIGIR is preferred) ']

job_text: ['', "  A department which values Diversity and Inclusion (D&I) and is committed to realizing the firm's D&I ambition which is an integral part of our global Conduct and Ethics Standards   The opportunity to become part of our highly motivated Analytics team focusing on building and driving new and state of the art technologies in various fields   An exciting role for you as Data Analyst within our Analytics & Data Science Lab and close collaboration with its Chief Operating Officer, Financial Crimes Compliance, Risk Management, IT and Operations teams as well as coordination with related organizations within our Bank   Manage developing, maintaining and extracting knowledge from strategic internal and external data sets   Manage documenting data attributes, data feeds and data sources in a concise and succinct way   Developing and crafting algorithms, building prototype versions, running multiple validations with business specialists and working on their operationalization   Becoming part of a forward-thinking team with an outstanding team spirit in a versatile, dynamic, and flexible working environment   Flexible / agile working options are possible  ", "Hardworking with proven experience as a strong, self-starting standout colleague with willingness to perform in a fast paced environment and contribute to the team's success", " A department which values Diversity and Inclusion (D&I) and is committed to realizing the firm's D&I ambition which is an integral part of our global Conduct and Ethics Standards ", 'Understands the value of diversity in the workplace and is dedicated to fostering an inclusive culture in all aspects of working life so that people from all backgrounds receive equal treatment, realize their full potential and can bring their full, authentic selves to work. University of Applied Sciences) or an equivalent education', ' Becoming part of a forward-thinking team with an outstanding team spirit in a versatile, dynamic, and flexible working environment ', ' Operations teams as well as coordination with related organizations within our Bank ', 'Outstanding written and verbal communication and interpersonal skills', " Understands the value of diversity in the workplace and is dedicated to fostering an inclusive culture in all aspects of working life so that people from all backgrounds receive equal treatment, realize their full potential and can bring their full, authentic selves to work. This should be further elaborated on in your application. Previous experience at Credit Suisse and in particular in the risk department would be an advantage A Bachelor or Master degree in a computer science, Information System, Information Technology (University or University of Applied Sciences) or an equivalent education Equivalent experience of at least 5 years in Data Analysis or Business Analysis Background in Finance, analytics methods and Data warehouse Principals and programming language like Python, R, SAS is a plus. Due to your experience with relational database programming and complex data pipelines you feel at ease in assembling data sets from disparate sources and analysis using appropriate quantitative methodologies, computational frameworks and systems Detailed knowledge in distributed data processing at scale using Spark or/and Hive is preferred Experience in the regulatory technologies or Risk and compliance domain within the financial industry is a plus! Outstanding written and verbal communication and interpersonal skills Integrity, responsibility and confidentiality required for dealing with sensitive data Hardworking with proven experience as a strong, self-starting standout colleague with willingness to perform in a fast paced environment and contribute to the team's success Do you possess ability to learn and take additional responsibilities to become a respected know-how carrier in the team? "]

job_title: Regional Sales Manager- $70 Mil Series B - Big Data Analytics
job_text: ['', 'Becoming an SME on our product and evolving with it.', 'After leading their last company to one of the most renowned exits in software sales, producing one of the largest multipliers in history en route, this team of rockstar leaders have finally landed at their next soon to be Unicorn (you WILL know these guys). Trust me, they pick them well.', 'That will not be an issue for you here.\xa0\xa0This company is going to change the way we see data in a MAJOR way through solving a genuine business problem.', 'Evangelising our solution in the market.', 'What will the role consist of?', 'Experience building out a region / start-up experience (hustlers).', 'Selling a complex IT solution (e.g. Big Data, DB, DevOps).', 'Closing deals on average of $250k at C-level.', 'If you put this off, you will miss the boat. Apply now.', '$300K-350K OTE + Stock + Most aggressive comp plan in the last DECADE', 'Hunting new business in the Washington and surrounding areas region.Playing a defining part in our journey to Unicorn status.Evangelising our solution in the market.Closing deals on average of $250k at C-level.Becoming an SME on our product and evolving with it.', 'Succesful track record of quota over-achievement (120%+).', 'Playing a defining part in our journey to Unicorn status.', '\xa0', '3+ years in enterprise software sales closing large deals ($200k).Selling a complex IT solution (e.g. Big Data, DB, DevOps).Succesful track record of quota over-achievement (120%+).Practical application of methodical sales process (MEDDIC ideal).Experience building out a region / start-up experience (hustlers).', 'Practical application of methodical sales process (MEDDIC ideal).', '3+ years in enterprise software sales closing large deals ($200k).', 'Regional Sales Manager- $70 Mil Series B - Big Data / Analytics', 'We are looking for a FIRST Senior RSM to build out the Washington & surrounding areas region from the ground up (with some great use cases already in the region). This is not for the faint-hearted so we are looking for tough individuals with serious drive to excel. This will take you to the next level, and make you a lot of money along the way.\xa0', 'Hunting new business in the Washington and surrounding areas region.', "Every week there seems to be a new Snowflake coming out of the blocks, but they rarely live up to the hype either due to lack of direction or a product that can't compete.", 'Experience needed to apply']

job_title: Sr. DevOps Engineer, Big Data Platform
job_text: ['', 'You are self-driven, willing and able to take complete ownership of initiatives and make pragmatic technical decisions. You are constantly looking for ways to improve and/or automate your efforts.', 'Participate in architecture discussions, influence product roadmap, and take ownership and responsibility over new projects.', 'Collaborate with cross-functional teams of developers, QA and operations to accomplish objectives.', 'Experience with Docker and Kubernetes is a plus.', 'Low level systems debugging, performance measurement & optimization on large production clusters.', ' You are self-driven, willing and able to take complete ownership of initiatives and make pragmatic technical decisions. You are constantly looking for ways to improve and/or automate your efforts. You are a driver of initiatives to streamline development & deployment, standardize on tools, and improve documentation quality. Proficiency in Bash and Python. Familiarity with SQL - good understanding about the basics of SQL (joins, creating tables) - this IS a Big Data team after all! Experience with and passion for experimentation and continuous integration. A minimum of 3 years’ experience as a DevOps Engineer. Hands-on experience with at least two core AWS features (e.g., CloudFormation ELB, EC2, S3, RDS, Elastic Beanstalk, EMR, OpsWorks, ECS). Experience administering data visualization tools like Tableau, Looker is a plus. Experience with Docker and Kubernetes is a plus. BS in Computer Science or closely related domain.', 'Hands-on experience with at least two core AWS features (e.g., CloudFormation ELB, EC2, S3, RDS, Elastic Beanstalk, EMR, OpsWorks, ECS).', ' Design and implement self-healing, auto-scaling, and self-documenting infrastructure supporting Big Data Platform. Collaborate with cross-functional teams of developers, QA and operations to accomplish objectives. Low level systems debugging, performance measurement & optimization on large production clusters. Participate in architecture discussions, influence product roadmap, and take ownership and responsibility over new projects. Maintain and support existing platforms and evolve to newer technology stacks and architectures. ', 'What You Will Do', 'Proficiency in Bash and Python.', 'Experience administering data visualization tools like Tableau, Looker is a plus.', 'BS in Computer Science or closely related domain.', 'Maintain and support existing platforms and evolve to newer technology stacks and architectures.', 'Experience with and passion for experimentation and continuous integration.', "What You've Done And What You Bring", 'You are a driver of initiatives to streamline development & deployment, standardize on tools, and improve documentation quality.', 'Familiarity with SQL - good understanding about the basics of SQL (joins, creating tables) - this IS a Big Data team after all!', 'A minimum of 3 years’ experience as a DevOps Engineer.', 'Sr. DevOps Engineer, Big Data Platform', 'Design and implement self-healing, auto-scaling, and self-documenting infrastructure supporting Big Data Platform.']
